If the interest is not confirmed the sales manager politely declines the client
Otherwise the sale manager passes the case to the proposal team
The proposal team is responsible to prepare commercial and technical offer for the client
Once the offer is prepared and validated the sales manager transmits the offer to the client and organizes a virtual meeting to present the offer and answers any question
If the offer is accepted by the client the proposal team with support of the legal team drafts a contract
The proposal and sales managers review the contract with the client before signature
The CEO travels to sign the contract with the client

In July there is a scout camp

The first step to ship a present abroad is to go to the delivery agency
You will have to tell the place where the package must be sent
They need information such as the country the town the street Then the present is weighed
Different packaging will be used depending on the weight of the package
If the weight is under 1kg an envelope will be used
But if it s above 1kg they will use a cardboard box
Once the packaging is defined the poste agency will apply a stamp on the package
You will have to pay for this service
They keep the package in the agency to ship it
Every Wednesday packages are collected for delivery
The day of delivery you will receive a message with the information of the shipment
After this message you will have to wait up to 5 days depending on where you want to send the package
Once the package is received you will receive a message confirming the receipt
If you don t receive a message after 5 days you have to contact the agency
Either there was an error and they restart the delivery process
In this case you earn a small compensation
Or the package is lost and they compensate the entire product because this is their fault

When a person posts an envelope in the mailbox of his village it is taken care of daily by the village letter carrier
The letter carrier then picks up the envelope and brings it back to the depot at the end of the day
At the depot the letter is taken to the sorting center specialized for letters
The next morning the letter is sorted according to its destination
Then a van takes charge of the letter and those that correspond to the same geographical area to bring them to the appropriate post center
Once arrived at the good deposit they are again sorted by smaller geographical zone
The next day very early in the morning around 4 00 at 7 30 the letters are distributed according to the rounds of the factors
The postmen sort the letters in the order of their rounds and then go to the inhabitants to deposit them
Making the delivery of packages
When a parcel arrives at the Bpost depot the first thing to do is to sort it according to the letter carrier s round
Then the mailman takes care of the parcel
The postman puts the parcel in his van according to the order of his round
Then he goes on his rounds to deliver it to the customer

If the customer is not there the parcel is either returned to the depot and the delivery is made again the next day or the parcel is dropped off at a neighbor s house or in a safe place or the parcel is dropped of at a relay point
In the last 2 cases it is up to the customer to pick up the parcel once it is marked as delivered

First the person puts his articles on the conveyor belt
Then the conveyor belt brings the items close to the cashier
The cashier says hello and starts scanning the items
Items can sometimes be heavy and require a physical effort from the storekeeper
The store clerk asks the customer while scanning the items if he has the loyalty card
If the customer has the loyalty card the store clerk asks him to put it in the reader and presses the Club Malin button on his cash register
If not the storekeeper suggests that the customer goes to a terminal to make his loyalty card and quickly explains how it works
When an article does not have a price or a barcode he calls on the microphone so that one of his colleagues can see it in the aisle and then notes the information by hand on his machine
Then when the scan of all the articles is finished he presses TOTAL on his cash register and announces the price displayed to the customer
Then the storekeeper looks to see if the person is paying by card or cash
If the person pays by card he presses on the bank card displayed on his cash register and then on OK
The person just has to put his card in the reader and write his code
A ticket is issued and the clerk hands it to the customer and says goodbye
If the customer pays by cash he notes the amount given by the customer and presses the cash button on the machine
The cash register opens and the ticket starts to come out
Then he gives the change and the receipt to the customer and says goodbye
The vaccination center is located at the Ciney Expo
First of all the receptionist greets the patient
Then he asks him for his identity card and his invitation to the vaccination and checks that the two names match
If they match the patient can continue the steps
If they do not match the patient is refused
If the patient does not have his ID card the patient must come back later
If the patient does not have his convocation but has some proof of his appointment he can continue the path and if not he must go to the information office
If the person has to go to the information desk the receptionist will show him the way to go there
The receptionist then checks the time of the appointment if it is in more than 15 minutes he asks the patient to wait
If the appointment is within 15 minutes or less the receptionist asks the patient to follow him her and to position him herself in front of the camera that takes the temperature
If the camera does not work directly the receptionist takes the infrared thermometer and points it on the patient s forehead
If the patient s temperature is less than 38 then the patient can continue the steps and if not the patient must go home and contact his doctor
If the patient is accompanied then the caregiver must ask if the person is autonomous or not
If the person is not autonomous the attendant is allowed to go with the patient
If not the accompanying person is not allowed to go with the patient
Then the receptionist indicates the way to the check in
He also indicates that there are documents on shelves along the way and that the patient must fill them out
If the patient does not know how to fill in the document on the shelves by himself the receptionist offers his help
The process starts when a client comes in a garage and the car dealer received a new car request from him
He assesses the needs and requirements of the client budget new or used vehicle type of vehicle number of seats on board engine power type of fuel etc
Car dealer searches cars based on client s car preferences
Seller can provide two possible responses
If he doesn t have a vehicle that meets the customer s needs he tells the client and the request stops there
If he has a vehicle that meets the customer s needs he proposes 3 types of car
For example a used car a new car in his stock or a new car that still needs to be built
Client can rejects all the proposed car or accepts one of the proposed cars or changes car preferences
In case of a vehicle is chosen car dealer requests client s personal information and asks if there is a car to take back the old vehicle or not and makes an offer for the new and the old car
After one weeks if the answer is not received a reminder is sent and client has another one week to answer
The delivery day the customer pays the rest of the bill and the garage ends up delivering the car to the customer
The process starts when the construction company received a new house request from a client
Construction company searches and evaluates possibilities based on client s house preferences budget appartement or house location number of bedrooms garden garage or not etc
Seller provides two possible responses an apartment or a house that meets the client s criteria and waits for the answer
After 1month if the answer is not received a reminder is sent and client has 2 weeks to answer
If no answer is received the request is cancelled and construction company notifies client
Client can provide four possible responses
If the customer is decided the construction company asks to the architect to make plans which will be submitted to the client
After 2 weeks if the answer is not received a reminder is sent and client has 2 weeks to answer

In my student job I work at CooperVision a company that sells and distributes lenses worldwide
First an order is placed by the customer optician or private individual
This order is received at CooperVision
The order received is automatically generated in a program
This program assigns a box with a unique barcode to this order
Depending on the size of the order a box can be divided into up to eight compartments named A to H each with a barcode
The box is then sent on a conveyor that runs through the entire company
Lasers placed at the beginning of each zone scan the barcode on the box to see if any of the products in the order belong in that zone
If no product from the zone is in the order the box continues and the process continues
If one or more products from the order are in the zone the box goes out on a ramp so that an employee can pick up the corresponding products
When the employee retrieves the box he she must first scan it to identify the box and check if it is properly segmented
If it is well segmented he has to validate this segmentation on his computer if it is not he has to change the segmentation of the box and then validate on the computer
After that the computer sends the employee to the location of the product
The employee must then scan the location of the product which serves as a check
The computer then tells the employee how many products to take what they are and where to put them in the box
The employee must validate the selection of the product s
The action can be repeated as many times as there are products in the area
Once there are no more products belonging to the order in the area the computer sends the message Done
The box must then be placed back on the conveyor line
Once all the items in the order have been picked the order continues on the conveyor to the packing area
Degrease your bodywork well with a degreaser
Clean with a dry cloth
Remove the remains of old paint using 600 grit sandpaper
Then sand with 1000 and 2000 grit sandpaper until you have a smooth surface
Apply the primer
Sand the primer with 2000 grit sandpaper
IMPORTANT Shake the can well for 2 minutes
Apply a first thin layer of base paint
Allow to dry for at least 10 minutes
Sand with sanding paper 20000
Apply a second coat of base paint
Allow to dry for at least 10 minutes
Sand with sandpaper 20000
Apply a first thin coat of coloured paint
Allow to dry for at least 10 minutes
Sand with sandpaper 20000
Apply a 2nd thin coat of coloured paint
Allow to dry for at least 10 minutes
The application of a varnish is not compulsory but strongly recommended

The following describes the order to cash process of the Belgian retailer ASB
The order to cash process starts when the client makes an inquiry and asks for a price
This can be done by email by phone or even in presence
Then the salesperson makes an offer and sends it to the client
The client can accept the offer reject it or ask for another price
In the latter case either a new offer will be made and sent to the client or the salesperson will stick to the offer
If the offer is accepted the client makes an order
The salesperson then creates an order confirmation and sends it to the client
The client checks it
If there are mistakes he will let the salesperson know who will then correct it and send a new one
If the order confirmation is correct the client validates it
After the salesperson checks if the goods are in stock or not
If the goods are not in stock they need to be ordered at the supplier
If the goods are in stock the salesperson creates a delivery note and sends it to the storekeeper
The storekeeper will prepare the goods
Either the goods will be delivered or the client will pick them up
If the goods will be delivered to the client the delivery note goes to the transportation department
They will deliver the goods
If the delivery went well the accounting department creates the invoice and sends it to the client
The client will then pay his purchase
If the delivery went wrong the firm needs to check its stock again and make a new delivery
If the goods are picked up by the client an accountant will directly create the invoice and send it to the client
The client will then pay his purchase
The following describes the procurement to pay process of the Belgian retailer ASB
The process starts when we notixce that a good that is needed is not in stock
The purchase department will then first create a delivery note for the client that asked for the goods
If the goods that need to be purchased are regular goods the purchaser will make an order directly
If the goods that need to purchased are specific goods the purchaser will ask for a price at the supplier
If the price is good the purchaser will accept it
If the price isn t good the purchaser will negotiate until the price is acceptable
After accepting the price the purchaser orders the goods
They will use the number of the delivery note through the whole procurement process at the supplier
After ordering the purchaser will get an order confirmation from the supplier and check it
If there are mistakes he will let the supplier know and ask for a new correct order confirmation
If the order confirmation is correct the purchaser will approve it
Then the goods will be delivered to the warehouse
In the warehouse the quantity and the quality of the goods will be checked
If there is something incorrect the purchaser will either ask for a new delivery or ask to get the missing goods at an additional delivery
If the goods are ok the firm will get an invoice from the supplier
A clerk will check the invoice
If the invoice is correct it will be sent to an accountant who will pay the supplier
If the invoice isn t correct the clerk will block it in the system
Then he will require a credit note at the supplier
After having received the credit note the clerk will unblock the invoice in the system and an accountant will pay the difference between the amount on the invoice and on the credit note
The process start when the client signs in his personal account
then AIRBNB asks the journey information from the client
Such as the place the period to stay maximum price to pay
Then AIRBNB analyze the client demand [places available in period demanded ] and give him the most interesting offers
Then the client have the option to choose one of the options don t choose any of them or do more filter like [amenities in the place to stay HOST language or to be a special HOST ]
if the client do more filter option the process is performed and analyzed again to give best offers and so on
if the client don t choose a place the process end
In case the client chooses a place AIRBNB request from the client an identity document recent personal picture and enter a payment card
if the client don t provide information the process is canceled
if the client provide all information AIRBNB take 24h to verify the identity and everything

then the AIRBNB give the decision either to reject the booking so the process is canceled and the client is informed or the booking is confirmed and the AIRBNB send to customer the booking information and finalize the process
The process start when the client log in to the company website
then the client fills in the travel information [departure arrival and dates ]

then the company analyze the information and consult the client past flights to see what he she prefer then give the client the most interesting flights [prices class ] with recommended flight based on past flights if exist

then the client can refuse all flights offered and the process is finished or change flights properties like changing the arrival airport or departure or also dates in this case the company re analyze the demand and give offers according to it or also the client could accept a flight
then the company propose some extra services to the client that have superior costs that could accept or refuse so after this the company ask the client to pay there is three method of payment first
if the client have a lot of bonus point in the account and could afford the flight cost with it or to pay the hole by the credit card
if he she is a new client or a client that has no bonus point he choses the third option which is hybrid

if the client has bonus point but not enough to cover all flight cost so he she will pay the rest with card the client has a limited time [there is no exact time but an estimation of 30 min] to pay or the website will be actualized and he she will repeat from the start
if the client pay within the time the flight is confirmed and company send flight information and E ticket to the client by mail
A company that needs to hire staff has an internal recruitment procedure
The hiring process starts when the company identifies an internal hiring need
Then the hiring staff devises a recruitment plan
The hiring staff generates a job description that includes a list of job requirements desired characteristics and requisite experience
The hiring staff advertises and recruits the position
For example the position is published by using a company s website social media platforms such as LinkedIn and newspaper advertisements
Then the hiring staff reviews the applications and identifies those that require interview
The interview are scheduled for the candidates with the people in the company involved
Some companies check the background of the candidates to be sure that the potential employees could represent the company in a professional manner
The reference of the candidates are checked also
After the background checking and reference checking the hiring staff takes decision
Then the hiring staff sends a job offer
After all the candidate who accepts the job offer is hired
After the hiring process the company has an onboarding process
The hiring staff prepares colleagues to welcome the new employee
Then the staff prepares the new employee s office and the tools that employee needs
For example the new employee needs computer access to programs email and phone numbers
The first day the new employee is presented to the team
Then the RH staff schedules meetings for to present the projects to the new employee
The RH staff assigns a mentor for the new employee
Then the mentor explains to the new employee the performance goals
The first month the RH staff registers the new employee in training
The RH staff makes also an evaluation after 30 60 and 90 days
The RH staff organizes an after work gathering to meet the new employee informally
After 6 months the HR staff evaluates the work of the new employee
Hotel Le Plaza is a luxury hotel with reception area open 24h a day
The check in process starts when customers present themselves at the reception
The receptionist requests their identification document and confirmation of reservation
Customers are asked to fill in the individual police form

The receptionist retrieves the completed police form and verifies the information to make sure all are correctly recorded in the management software or else he she has to encode the missing information
The receptionist requests a deposit used to cover customers expenses that might occur during the stay
The deposit can be given by credit card or in cash
If the reservation is prepaid a deposit of 50 per night is required
If the reservation is not prepaid the receptionist requests a deposit amounting to the total of the price of the stay plus 50 per night
Then the receptionist checks the status of the attributed room in the management software
The hotel offers several types of room such as classic deluxe and suite
If the assigned room is ready the receptionist gives the room key to customer and explains them about the hotel s facilities the process is finished
If the assigned room is not ready after the check in time the receptionist allocates another room gives the key to customers and explains them about the hotel s facilities the process is finished

If the assigned room is not ready before the check in time the receptionist informs the customer and ask the housekeeping department to put the customer s room in priority to get it ready as soon as possible
The housekeeping department notifies the reception when the room asked previously is ready
The receptionist gives the room key to customer and explains them about the hotel s facilities the process is finished

The Pomodorino is a company which makes homemade tomato sauce by using tomatoes from Italy and a machine that presses the tomato
The workers start by cutting the tomatoes in half to make cooking easier the next day
The company leaves the chopped tomatoes in the saucepans overnight
Once the night has passed the company passes the tomatoes through a machine that costs around  500 and which is made of iron which presses the tomato
The company installs bed sheets to filter the water and preserve the tomato juice
Like when you use a sieve to filter the solid
The juice is collected and cooked for 5 hours adding salt regularly La Baleine brand salt
The sauce is then bottled
The company checks that the caps close properly to promote sterilization
The company places the bottles under cover to maintain the sterilization phase
The company puts the bottles in the cold warehouse
The diploma department is part of the University
The process starts when a graduated student call to make a appointment for receiving his diploma
The employee asks for the disponibilities of the student
The student communicates his agenda
For example Tuesday and Wednesday afternoon
The employee makes a appointment regarding the disponibility
On the due date the student arrives
The employee asks the student to present his ID card
The student gives his ID card
The employee gives the diploma to the student and gives some information
The diploma contains the languages of learning the title of the thesis and the grades
The student reads and checks if all the information are correct
If there is a mistake the diploma is sent back to the faculty and the process has to restart
If there is no mistake the student signs his diploma to validate it
Meanwhile the employee writes the ID information on the acknowledgement of receipt
The student signs the acknowledgement of receipt to confirm that he has received the diploma
The student leaves with his diploma
The employee desinfects the place for the next student the process is finished
The process starts when a new year starts
The scanning of the acknowledgement receipts has the objective to keep documents available for many years
The student takes the acknowledgement receipts with names beginning with one specific letter and from the previous year
The student sorts the acknowledgement receipt by alphabetical order
For example first Anom Dupont and then Azul Benjamin
In addition the student unties the potential sheets of paper attached to them with a staple
The student scans the acknowledgment receipts
The student transfers the PDF file into the appropriate folder
The student opens the PDF file
The student renames individually each acknowledgement receipt by the name of the person who signed it
When all the acknowledgement receipts are renamed the student deletes the original PDF file
The objective is to avoid having twice the same document
The student ties the potential paper that he untied
The student puts the acknowledgement receipts in a box for archiving
The student restarts the process with the next letter
If he started with names beginning with the letter A now he has to do the names beginning with the letter B
When all the letters are done the process is finished
The Big 4 often have a high staff turnover so a sorting system is necessary to ensure that not just anyone is working for the company
The process starts when the company receives an application
The candidate s CV is reviewed by the human resources department
After analysing the CV HR sends an e mail to the candidate either to schedule an interview if it matches the criteria sought by the company or to inform the candidate that he or she is not suitable
The head of the HR department passes the interview on to the candidate
Within 3 days after the interview the company informs the candidate that he or she will have to take skills tests
If not the candidate is informed that he or she is not selected
The HR department schedules a date with the candidate for the skills test
For example a test consisting of 20 questions in the form of multiple choice questions
The company passes the test to the candidate
If the candidate passes the test the company makes an offer within 7 days otherwise it informs the candidate that he or she is not selected
The offer is sent either by e mail or by fax depending on the company s choice
Once the candidate has accepted the offer the company schedules an appointment with the candidate to have him her sign the employment contract
The process ends when the candidate signs the contract
Nowadays it is not always easy to make yourself something to eat every day when you come home from work it is sometimes too late and you don t feel like cooking
That s why Takeaway a Dutch company offers its services to Internet users
The process starts when you start to get hungry no matter what time of day or where you are
Once you feel hungry you go to the Takeaway website
Once on the site you can browse through the various offers on offer
If the offers on the site do not appeal to us or do not correspond to our expectations we log out and decide to cook a good meal anyway
Otherwise if a restaurant or brasserie appeals to us the process continues and we click on the desired restaurant
It is important to know that Takeaway offers something for every taste Chinese food Italian food
Once you are on the restaurant s offers you have to choose your dish
When the dish is chosen you just have to click on the order button
An additional window will then appear with a summary of the order
The customer must then check the different elements of his order to make sure there are no surprises on reception
If everything is correct you can click on the pay button
However there is one thing to pay attention to namely the delivery costs
In fact Takeaway does not work for free additional costs are then charged to the person ordering usually 5
When the payment is settled both Takeaway and the restaurateur receive the order notification
At this moment the customer only has to wait for the delivery man to ring the doorbell
The process ends when the customer receives their food at the delivery point they specified when placing their order
All the customer has to do is enjoy their delicious meal

When I m hungry I decide first if I m going to cook something or I m going to order from a restaurant

I ordered clothes on Shein and a few days later I receive my package by Bpost

In August 2019 my big sister got married

Zara is part of Inditex the world s largest fashion retailers
I applied on the Inditex Careers website
Once you are registered on Inditex Careers you will be able to register your personal data and submit your resume and your cover letter
About a week later you get a response and an invitation to a group interview
At the interview you receive forms to fill out and you will be asked in which store and department you would like to work at
Inditex is composed of eight brands so you will have to choose whether you want to work for Zara Bershka Pull   Bear
Then you will be split into groups of 5 persons and you will watch videos about the company
After watching clips questions will be asked
Participation is not mandatory but highly encouraged
Again you will be split into groups of 3 people

3 days later I was called to tell me that I would work in such Zara and such department

The process starts when the customer enters the website of Pull Bear
The website shows 2 different categories to choose from Man or Women
After the customer makes his choice the website direct them to other categories Clothing shoes bags
The customer explores among all the products and select the ones he likes
Then he chose the right size and adds the item to the shopping cart
The client has two different options
He can return to the main page and repeat the process again
Or he can directly go to process the order
For the latter the customer needs to sign in or he can continue as a guest
After that the customer choose how he prefers its products to be delivered Store delivery collection point or home delivery
For the two first options Pull Bear requests the customer s address and provide him with a list of stores and drop off points close to his location to choose from
Then it requests the customer s personal details
However if the client chose home delivery Pull Bear will directly ask about his personal details email name phone number and the delivery details his home address
Then the customer has two possibilities Standard delivery or Express delivery Plus money fees
After the order is made the client proceeds to the payment online
When the payment is received Pull Bear notifies the client by sending a confirmation mail
After the product is transferred to DPD Belgium a delivery service Pull Bear sends an electronic ticket to notify the customer
On the day the delivery DPD Belgium sends a message to inform the customer about the delivery time
And the customer receives the parcel
That is the end of the process
The process starts when the customer enters the app Bla Bla Car in his phone

Then he selects his preferences Not talking during the trip being okay with travelling with animals
After that the customer completes his Journey route Departure and destination number of passengers the date
The app shows a list of carpooling offers by cars and by bus sorted by time
The customer books the best offer after checking the offers details The meeting place the time the price the driver and the driver s car
He passes then to complete the payment details
The driver receives a notification from the customer
He can provide two answers
He can either accept or reject
In the latter the reservation gets cancelled
If he accepts the customer gets notified and the payment is processed
Then the driver gets in direct contact with the customer
After the trip both the driver and the customer post a review about each other
And the process ends here
The concerned course is the econometrics course for 3rd baccalaureate students
The process starts when I contact the teacher to know the exercises I have to prepare

I prepare the new exercises

I remind students of the time and location of the session

The process begins when the pharmacist receives a prescription for a specific drug
The job of pharmacist may indeed require preparing drugs in a laboratory
The pharmacist informs the client of the time when the medication will be ready
The pharmacist checks his stocks
He contacts colleagues if he lacks ingredients
Once he has eventually been helped out he weighs the ingredients
A pharmacist s laboratory contains all the necessary equipment
He prepares the mixture then
He puts the medication in the right container pills syrup
He labels the package
The pharmacist prepares the bill
The process is finished when the client has collected and paid their drug
Naret is a national retailer which sells food and non food products offline and online
The process starts when a customer decides to buy groceries
The customer navigates on their website to buy a wide range of groceries
The customer completes his online basket of products and validates his list
The retailer receives the list of groceries
The next day an employee is given the list and starts collecting the groceries in the physical shop
When the cart contains all the groceries contained in the list the employee encodes on the shop software
After that the customer is notified about the fulfilment of his order
Then the customer goes to the physical shop where his groceries are ready for pick up
The customer tells the employee at whose name the order is
Thus the employee gives to the customer his order who pays by card or by cash
The employee marks as out the groceries

Acounti is a small accounting firm which handles the accounts of his clients and provides advices to them
The process starts when the accountant enters and his office and checks his management software
The documents needed to encode the accounting records are sent there by every client
He downloads the documents of a specific client from this software
After having downloaded all the required documents the accountant starts the accounting software and encodes each transaction
When he has done all the sales purchases and financial records for this client he ticks on the management software that the encoding for this client is completed
If there are still documents to download for other clients or if new documents have been received he downloads these and starts encoding again
When there are no more documents on the software the accountant checks his e mails and answers to some if needed
If a meeting with a client is scheduled that day the accountant receives the client in his office
When the client is sitting on his chair the accountant answers his questions and provides him advices
At the end of the appointment the client leaves and the accountant continues his work where he left off
If there are no mails to answer or clients to receive the accountant starts to work on the financial statements such as the balance sheet for the end of the quarter
When the clock strikes 5 pm the accountant turns off his computer and drives back home the process is finished
Carrefour is a store which handles packages received by mail
The process starts when a customer comes to the counter
The customer has three possibilities to get his parcel
Either he can give the reference of the parcel or he gives his last name or he gives the paper received from the letter carrier
The employee has to enter the reference or the family name into the computer or scan the paper received
The employee receives a product description

Either the product is a coli in this case the system will write big coli followed by the number corresponding to the one written on the coli or the system is an envelope and the system will write small coli followed by the number corresponding to the one written on the envelope
The employee takes the right package or letter among all the others
The system will then notify if the package or letter requires proof of identity or not
If the package or letter requires proof of identity the customer will be asked to fill out a document
For example with his name first name a signature
And finally the employee hands over the package
Or there is no need for a signature and the employee hands over the package directly
The consumer takes the package and leaves
Many Carrefour stores have a small butcher shop
The process begins when a customer comes to the counter
The butcher encodes his or her name on the scale so that we know who is serving the customer
Several butchers cannot use the same scale at the same time or the system will break down
The customer designates the meats he wants
Then the customer says the number of slices or the weight of each product
For example the customer asks for 3 slices of lean ham or packs 200gr of scampi salad
Then the butcher shows the customer what she has cut up and asks for confirmation
The customer can either say that the quantity is good in which case the process continues
Or the customer is not satisfied with the quantity and the butcher starts cutting the meat again
In both cases the butcher then individually packages each piece of meat and encodes the price per kilo on the scale
When the customer has finished his order the butcher packs the whole thing in a larger package
Then the butcher prints the label and sticks it on the package
The customer takes the order and goes to the cashier to pay

Krfel is a company that works with stores in which the consumers can come to see the products
But the products are stored elsewhere and delivered directly to the customer s premises
The process starts when the customer orders the product in the store
The seller takes the data of the client and send the order at the central control center after that the stock has been checked
If there is an available stock the process can continue normally
If not the client has to pick up another good
Krfel suggests a wide range of fridges to satisfy all the needs of the client
After that an invoice is sent to the client if he cannot pay directly at the store
As soon as the payment is verified by the accounting department a message is sent to the central control center
Then the best way to deliver the product is designed to minimize the costs i e the warehouse used the combination of customer during the tour and the date
Indeed due to the pandemic the cost minimization is extremely important
The delivery center send a message to the client in order to verify the possible schedule of delivery
If it is not possible another date is suggested to the client
When the client accept the delivery schedule a message is sent to the delivery team with the instructions of the day
The process starts with the client ordering something on the website
Once the product basket is finished a payment is required to send the list at the shop
After the payment the shop receives the list of the products selected by the client
The order manager then notifies a worker to complete the entire basket of goods in the shop
As soon as the order is completed the basket of goods must be put in the fridge in the meantime
As you know the food products have to be storage in the fridge otherwise some bacteria can develop
In this case it is the shop that is designed responsible for this mistake
The worker then notifies the person in charge of orders
The latter marks the task as completed in the order book and sends a message to the customer at the same time
The customer from that moment on has to pick up the order within 24 hours

If the order is not picked up within the time limit the worker has to put the food back on the shelves and the order manager will charge the client an extra 5 with a request for confirmation of the previous order
If so the process starts again
If not a refund is made
VPharma is a pharmaceutical company
The process starts when the ordering department send the order to suppliers
Suppliers take the order into account
Suppliers prepare and send the items
The items are transported by trucks
The receiving department receive the items
The receiving department check if quantities are right or if there is a damaged good
And encode the information into an internal software
In the case of wrong quantity or damaged good the receiving department send a complaint to suppliers
Few times after the reception the accounting department receive the invoice
The accounting department check if quantities on the invoice are correct regarding what the receiving department have encoded
If the invoice is correct the accounting department encode it and put it as to pay
If the invoice is incorrect the accounting department send another complaint to supplier encode the invoice and put it as to nonpay
At the end of each month invoices marked as to pay are paid
Invoices marked as to non pay are paid if the company have received a credit note or the items missing
Bettolins soins infirmiers is a at home curing company
The process starts when a patient calls the company for curing
The company encode the personal information of the patient and conclude a date for the first cure
The day of the appointment the company send a nurse to the patient s home
The nurse goes to the patient s home by car
On the spot the nurse see which cure is needing check if the patient has a doctor s agreement paper and makes the cure
The nurse leaves to go to another patient
At the end of the day the nurse encodes all doctor s agreement paper into a software
The software acts like an agenda and puts each patient at a different time of following days depending on how many cures they need
At the end of the month the nurse sends how many times She has gone to each patient during the month to health mutual for being paid
I Decide to do an omelet

I crack the eggs and beat them
I put the whole thing in a frying pan and turn on the hotplate
I wait for my eggs to be ready

I finish eating my omelet or scrambled eggs
A customer arrives
Ask him directly what he wants or let him look at what is in the shop then ask him what he wants
If the customer wants an item other than a personalized bouquet of flowers go directly to the checkout and proceed to the payment and give the item
If the customer wants a personalized bouquet ask him the price he would like to put in the bouquet as well as his preferences
Select the flowers that could suit the customer s expectations
Arrange the bouquet
If the customer is satisfied proceed to the payment and give him the bouquet
If not ask him again what he wants for more details

If he likes some but not all of the flowers change the flowers he doesn t like with the ones he would like as long as necessary until the bouquet matches the customer s expactations Then back to arrange the bouquet
If the customer doesn t like the bouquet at all he leaves Replace the flowers in their storage pots
Recytex is a company which sorts used clothes and shoes
Those clothes are resold or send to developing countries
The process starts when people put their clothes and shoes in clothing bubbles
Trucks will go empty those bubbles and will bring the clothes and shoes to the factory
At the factory the content is sorted by type pants t shirt shoes
Then each type of clothing is send to its work station
At the work station the clothes and shoes are sorted in terms of quality
Then each level of quality is put in the same container
For instance the t shirts of poor quality are put in the same container as the shoes of poor quality
Once the containers are loaded they are weighted labelled and send to the right destination
If the container is labelled as great quality it is send to a second hand shop
If the container is labelled as poor quality it is send to a developing country
Val Dieu is an abbey which offer guided tours on their site
The customer can make a reservation online by phone or at the secretary at Val Dieu
A maximum of ten people tour is accepted
Once ten people have made a reservation for a tour the reservations are closed for this tour and another tour which is planned an hour later is added to the schedule
Again there is a maximum of six tours per day
The day of the tours the guide arrives at the secretary and is informed about its groups how many tours how many people tour
The customer pays online when making the reservation or when he arrives at Val Dieu
If the customer cancels their reservation the reservations are reopened for his tour
The customer can cancel their reservation at any time
If the customer has already paid he is refunded

The process starts when the client comes to the Health Mutuel s main hall
The customer sends a request for a needed service through the ticket machine
Health Mutual s receptionist receives the customer s request for a needed service
Then the customer and the receptionist have to wait until it will be the customer s turn after what the customer could go to the receptionist s window
The receptionist asks the client to provide personal information
The client provides the receptionist with his her personal information
The client s personal information could be provided by giving his her identity card or another relevant document
Receptionist receives the client s personal information
After what the receptionist should determine if the client s request could be done by him her or if it is necessary to take an appointment with a consultant
On one hand If the request could be done by the receptionist he she will do so and send the notification to the client about it
The client will receive the notification about his her realized request
On the other hand if the request could not be done by the receptionist the latter will take an appointment for the client with the consultant
After one of these steps the receptionist will ask the customer to wait and if he she need anything else
On one hand if the client needs something else the process will restart at the determine if the request could be done by the receptionist from the step 9
On the other hand if the client answer is no then he she will leave the Health Mutual and the request will be fulfilled for a client and for the receptionist
This business process starts when the client decides to build a new house
Client searches for an appropriate land For example the land in a client s preferred region which is situated not so far from his her home = example sentence
Once the appropriate land found the client takes contact with a chosen architect and sends a construction request demand to him her
Client sends all the information about the land to the architect and wait for his her response and approval = details
The architect analyses the client s land choice in accordance with client s needs
The architect has 2 choices to approve the chosen land or not
On one hand if the architect does not approve the land he will send the information about the non approval of the land to the client The process will resume from the step 5 for the architect
In this case the client will receive the non approval of the land and will search for another one therefore the process will resume from the step 2 for the client
On the other hand if the architect approves the land the client will receive a notification
In this case the client will contact the bank in order to ask for a loan
Client receives a bank loan
In the meantime the architect analyses the clients demand and needs in order to develop the prototype of a construction project
The architect sends the prototype version of the project to the client The client receives the project prototype and then he she will decide to approve it or not =details

On one hand if the client does not approve the project s prototype he she will notify the architect about it and will wait for a new prototype project version the process will resume from the step 13 for a client and from the step 12 for the architect
On the other hand if the client approves the project s prototype he she will notify the architect about it and the architect will receive the notification
The architect develops the final version of the project
The architect sends this project version to the communal house
The architect receives the project approval from the communal house
The architect sends the communal house approval to the client and the client receives it
The client validates the final project and the architect receives this validation
The architect sends a quote for his her work to the client and at the same time makes a call for tenders to several construction companies
Once these two operations are done simultaneously the client sends the payment documents and therefore notifies the architect about it The architect receives the payment
The architect receives the bids from the construction companies
The architect analyses these bids and chooses the most appropriate ones
The architect sends the most appropriate bids to the client and the client receives it
The client analyses the bids
The client sends the bids approval to the architect and pays them The architect receives payment and the notification of approved bids
The architect asks for the construction services from the chosen construction companies
The architect receives the construction services
That is how the request for the house construction application ends for the client and for the architect
After that the house construction is launched =
Before playing a Basketball game once a week we gather information about different playing grounds by phone email or on person
we check if pitches are available after checking availability of the pitches

we go to the specified playing ground

if we don t have enough money we cancel the game
if we gather it we finally play the game
In order to rent a car for the weekend holiday we start by searching for altered agencies who provide this service
Then to efficiently select the best one we filter them by price service quality and ancient user s reviews

If the desired car meets our schedule we give our personal data if not we choose another car which meets our schedule then give our data
if no car is meeting our schedule we contact another agency

After giving our personal data we get an email to pay the car fees including insurance

Phone group is a firm that provides Customer management services to many companies around the world
In order to ask for a day off within the organisation the employee prepares a request and sends it to the service Manager by email
When the service manager receives the request he she transfers it to the set supervisor
The set supervisor verifies the eligibility conditions
If the employee does not have enough leave balance the set supervisor rejects the request
If the employee has enough leave balance the set supervisor transfers the request to the Human Resources Management service
For example when the employee wants 2 days off and he only has a leave balance of 1 day the request is rejected
The Human Resources Management service contacts the set supervisor for a confirmation of the request approval after receiving the request
If the set supervisor does not confirm the request approval the request is rejected
If the set supervisor confirms the request approval the Human Resources Management service checks the availability of the replacement staff
If the replacement staff is not available the Human Resources Management service rejects the request
If the replacement staff is available the Human Resources Management service sends them an email containing the slots
The replacement staff receive the email containing the slots
If the replacement staff does not confirm within 24 hours the request is rejected
If the replacement staff confirms within 24 hours the request is confirmed and the employee is notified by email
Having a double degree can be a very interesting experience
Student receive an information email concerning double degree programs from the Head of International relationships of HEC
15 days after the Head of international relationships of HEC sends another email containing a link to an online meeting concerning double degree programs
The student participate in the online meeting in order to know the application details
The application procedure is easy and rapid
The student sends an email to the Head of International Relationships in HEC in which he specifies the double degree he is interested in
The Head of International Relationships verifies the students grades in order to check his her eligibility to the choosen program
If the student is not eligible the Head of International Relationships in HEC rejects the application and notifies the student by email
If the student is eligible the Head of International Relationships in HEC contacts the exchanges manager of the choosen uiversity for confirmation
If the exchanges manager of the choosen university does not confirm the application is rejected and the student is notified by email
If the exchanges manager of the choosen university confirms the application is accepted and the student is notified by email

The process starts when CIBLE RH publishes a new job opportunity on its website
Interested applicants send their CV and motivation letters

RODIV HOTEL is a renown hotel in Malaysia
Its order to cash process is triggered when the Clerk receives a reservation request from a potential client by e mail
This reservation request includes arrival day departure day and type of room requested
The Clerk registers the request and verifies the availability of the room
If the room is not available the clerk rejects the request by sending a rejection e mail to the client
In case the room is available the Clerk documents the request and sends a confirmation e mail to the client
The Clerk then fowards the reservation request to the Finance department for billing
The finance department establishes the bill and fowards it to the client with a link for online payment
If the client doesn t pay in 72 hours the clerk cancells the reservation and notifies the client by e mail
Once the client pays the bill the Finance department sends proof of payment to the clerk
The Clerk then confirms the reservation with the client by sending him an access code and the process is fulfilled
The process starts when a department notifies the RH department regarding a vacated position by mail or phone The RH department sets up a hiring team
The team generates a job description
The job description has a prioritized list job requirements qualifications desired characteristics and experience
The team advertises the job description through the company s website and social media platforms for example the team can publish the job description on Linkdin
The team receives applications by email then the team reviews the applications
if the candidate doesn t meet the minimum requirements for the position the team eliminates the candidate
if not the team schedules an interview with the candidate
Before the interviews all candidates are subject to a background check criminal record employment history credit checks
If there is something wrong within the background check the team eliminates the candidate
Once the interviews with the potential candidates are completed
then the team identifies their best choice then the team extendsthe offer letterthe salary start date policies
Negotiations are more likely to follow
If the candidate accepts the job The company hires the candidate if not the team identifies their best choice again
The process ends by onboarding the new worker and welcoming him
The process starts when the person decides to buy a house

The process starts when a bookseller order books from a book provider
The books can be available or not
If they are not available it means that it will be delivered later and so the process is delayed until it is available
The book provider checks if the books are physically available
An employee scans them to remove them from the stocks
An invoice is automatically created and sent by mail or post
The bookseller has 15 days to pay
If no payment is received within the delay a reminder is sent
The next week depending on the location of the store the books are delivered on Wednesday or Thursday
15 days after the delivery a return notice is sent
If some books aren t sold then they are returned
An employee of the book provider checks physically if the books are returned
Sometimes it happens that there is a mistake and the quantities on the paper doesn t match with what is sent in reality
A credit note is sent to the bookseller through mail or post
The process ends with the reimbursement of the unsold books
The process starts when somebody calls the company
An employee answers the phone
If it is an existing customer he is redirected to the right service
If it is a new registration the employee asks for the client s information
Such as the name birthdate phone address EAN code type of energy
If all of the information is given then the registration process ends and the information are sent to the network manager
If one or more information is missing the registration is on hold and nothing is sent to the network manager
The client has to recontact the company to give those data
If the client doesn t come back with the missing information after three days a reminder is sent by mail
It happens that mails are redirected to the spam
Five days later if nothing is given an employee calls the client to see if the client can give the information
If the client gives the information the registration ends and the information are sent to the network manager
If he doesn t have them he is asked to contact the network manager to get the missing information
Most of the time people don t know the EAN code of their house which is necessary to precisely detect the point of supply
Twenty days later if the client doesn t come up with the missing information the registration is cancelled and a mail is sent to the client

Deliveroo is a food delivery service founded in 2013

Myntra is a popular fashion ecommerce website in India

The ordering process is completed
Apple jam is a delicious and healthy option to eat along with different breads
To make apple jam you will require 4 apples 1 cup of sugar and water
First peel and cut the apples into small cubes
Next place them in a shallow pan and fill it with just enough water to cover the apples
Then cook the apples until the pieces start to become soft and translucent
This can be done on the stove or in a microwave
Stick a knife into a few of the pieces to make sure they are cooked
Wait for the apples to cool off
Once they are at room temperature again transfer the apples and water to a mixer
Add the sugar and blend until smooth
Add water if it is too thick
Once you get a smooth mixture transfer it back to the pan and cook on a slow flame
Make sure to continuously turn the mixture while on the stove
If using a microwave then heat at intervals of 45 seconds and turn the mixture in between
Do this until the mixture starts thickening and becomes gelatinous
Take the mixture off the heat or out of the microwave when it has reached a jam like consistency
Let the jam cool off in the fridge and enjoy

Burger King is a fast food restaurant that serves all kinds of burgers fries desserts etc
There are about 40 shops in Belgium and I worked in one of them last summer
The process starts when the client is hungry and decides to eat a meal
He can choose to order on an app like UberEats and have it brought to his home or he can go directly to the nearest Burger King shop
If he goes to a shop he can choose to order at the kiosk or near a cashier
If he orders at the kiosk he will be asked to scan the QR code on his app to earn points based on the amount he will spend
Then he chooses the burger he wants from a list of 15 more or less
He also chooses his drink and the size of his menu medium or large
When he has chosen everything he wants he pay for his order
When his order is finalised he receives a number by which he will be called when his order is ready
At this moment the cooks start to prepare the burger
The fries are already ready because they are continuously cooked
At the same time a student prepares the tray with a napkin drink and dessert if any
The preparation should not take longer than 6 minutes
When all the parts of the order are ready the student puts everything on the tray and calls the customer by his number so that he can collect it
The process ends when the customer leaves with his meal

Remove the individual parts of the drums from their covers
Prepare the positioning area by adding a rug
The rug prevents the drum set to slide while playing
Build up the drum set to the drummer s preference
Tune the snare drum and the toms
A bad tuning of the snare and toms can result in unpleasant sound during the concert
Order the various songs that will be played
Install the microphones to various parts of the drum set
Check the volume levels of every microphone
Do an overall soundcheck of the drum set
During the soundcheck the sound engineer can see if some microphone volumes are set too high or too low
Do an overall soundcheck with the whole band
Adjust the levels again if necessary
The drum set is ready for the concert

Add the last spoonful of oil to the pan

First begin by removing your makeup thoroughly
For example choose a mild cleansing milk
Wet your face lightly
Gently rub your face with a scrub
Rinse off with a soft cloth dampened in lukewarm water
Do a facial sauna or place your head over a basin filled with hot water for 15 minutes to open the pores
The steam will allow the pores to open zero blackheads goal
Once the pores opened remove the blackheads by pressing the skin with a tissue
Spread the cleansing mask all over your face
This type of mask contains clay
Leave on for about 20 minutes
Rinse off the face with a soft cotton or a cloth soaked in lukewarm water
Apply a hydrating or radiance mask
The mask must be adapted to your skin type
Finish your facial care by applying your day cream

TheBigFour is the nickname used to refer collectively to the four largest professional services networks in the world
They provide financial services throughout the world
First an identification of the firm wishing to get services is mandatory we need to know its activity and location
The identification process is done by the Onboarding department
The potential client has to provide all the documentation needed for the whole identification and AML process
Then there is the identification of the board of management
Afterwards a deep investigation concerning the identity of the UBO is done Ultimate Beneficial Owners
Then an AML review is done by the AML department if all the identification are validated
This part is the longest and can last 2 days to 3 weeks regarding the size of the analyzed company
The potential client will then be checked regarding its independence with the firm conflict of interest are not desirable it is done by the Independence department
When all the precedent process are completed every information if gathered and expose to a committee of acceptation in order to know if the firm accept or not that client
If refused the client is or rejected or send back to the first step of identification for a better review
The firm will could not accept a client if his reputation would be at risk by having relations with him
With acceptation of the committee the client is valid and business negotiations start regarding the services and the drawing of the contract starts
The team giving the service celebrate the acquisition and acceptation of a new client
Each year the AML process will be done again for risky clients each 2 years for moderate ones and each 3 years for riskless clients
When it s been a long time not seeing my family or friends I go back to France
I need in first place to check the timetables of the trains and buses
I book my train from Lige and Luxembourg
With a minimum of 15min of transition I then book a second train from Luxembourg to Metz
I will then print both of my tickets at my friend s place in the next street
I pack my stuff and the D day I leave my place
I take a bus to the train station
I validate my train tickets with the different machines
It is really easy and fast to do most of the machines are in the middle of the hall
I take my 2 trains as planned
I love this part it allows me to listen to music and admire the Belgium landscapes
Once at Metz I have to take a bus to do so I go to a machine that sells tickets near the train station
If there are no buses anymore because it is too late a friend or a relative will pick me up to get home
If there are still buses I take the 98 one for a 20min duration
I get off and walk for 15min and I am finally home

The Driving test in Lige take place at the Wandres Auto center
The process starts when the customer arrives with his guide in the parking lot
The customer enters and takes place in the line of the counter
The employee asks to the customer s and guide s papers
For instance the customer must show the insurance the conformity certificate of the car and their roadbook of 1500km fulfilled
The employee fills in the client s registration and asks for payment
The customer pays by cash or by card
After the employee asks to the customer to go to the theory room
The customer takes a theory exam of 6 questions
After the theory exam the examinator comes and steers the customer to their car
The examinator asks to the customer to demonstrate certain features of the car
For example the examinator may ask how to turn on the headlights where the brake fluid is located and so on
The examinator asks to the customer to start the car and to follow the instructions
After 30 minutes on average the examinator asks to the customer to return to the autocenter
The customer returns to the auto center and turns off the car
The examinator completes the pass or deferral paperwork
The process is finished
Every morning starts the same way
My alarm rings at 7 o clock and I get up out of my bed

This is a car tutorial
First you have to get your key ready
Unlock your car and get in
Once inside your car the first thing you have to do is to fasten your seatbelt
Then check if all the mirrors are well positioned and at the same time check if your seat is in good position
You may want to start the radio but that s not a good idea
Before ignition you have to check if the gearbox is in neutral position? If yes you can start the car
If not you have to clutch in before
Once the car is running you have to release the clutch while pushing down the gas pedal at the same time if you already clutched before starting the car
If you started the car in neutral position it is now the time to clutch in and set a gear
Once the gear is set you release the clutch and push down the gas pedal together

He is then ready to sell it to the clients
Rue Neuve in Brussels is great for shopping
The process starts when all of a sudden a griel gets her purse ripped off
She watch the suspect running away
She then asks a pedestrian to dial 101 to alert the police
An operator picks up and the woman gives him a description of her thief
The operator tells her that a team will be dispatched to the scene as soon as possible
A response team arrives within 5 minutes and takes the woman s statement
At the same time another team searches the surrounding streets for the suspect
If the suspect is found he is arrested and taken to the police station
Then the stolen bag is returned to the owner
In some cases the bag is found on the suspect but is empty
If not the surveillance cameras in the surrounding area are analysed and a wanted notice is created
In both cases the lady comes to the police station to make her statement
If she was injured during the robbery she is offered a visit to the hospital
If her attacker has not been found she will be kept informed of the outcome of the investigation
Anapharma is a drugstore located in Ans next to a butcher shop
The process starts when a customer passes the automatic door
The customer places himself in the queue or goes directly to the counter
The customer gives his prescription to the pharmacist or asks for some medicine
For example a specific medication or simply a box of cough drops
The pharmacist looks at the availability of certain drugs in the computer
Anapharma has a large inventory sorted alphabetically with the majority of necessary medicines
The pharmacist prepares the customer s order
The pharmacist scans the medicines
A specific software automatically updates the stock as well as the purchase history of the customer
The pharmacist informs the customer on how to take the medication and sticks the labels on the boxes
The pharmacist supplies the client with his order
The customer takes his order
The customer pays cash or pays by card
The customer leaves the drugstore the process is finished
Carrefour is a French retail group that provides customer with a complete service in any area
The process starts when the customer enters the supermarket
The customers takes a shopping trolley
The customer check the availability of the items he needs
The music in the supermarket allows him to spend a pleasant moment while shopping
The customer puts the items he wants to buy in the shopping trolley
The customer goes to the supermarket checkout
The customer places all the items on the conveyor
The supermarket cashier scans all the different products
The scanner beeps at each item scanned
The customer puts his items in a bag
The supermarket cashier requests him the final price
The customer pays cash or pays by card
The customer puts away his shopping trolley
The customer leaves the supermarket the process is finished
Business process description of a Belgian company which manufactures macarons
The process begins when the sales manager receives a call an email or a demand directly from the website
He registers the order in a software used across the company
The production manager receives a notification that an order is arrived
He checks if there are the available components in the stock to produce the required macarons
There are different range of macarons like sweet macarons savoury macarons gourmet macarons
f the components are available the production can begin but if not the manager has to order the components to a supplier and the production will be able to begin once the order is received
After the production is done the macarons are placed in a cold storage for at least one day and the production manager notify the software that the production is completed
24 hours later the packaging manager receives the notification and allocates the work to the workers
Once the packaging is done the sales manager is notified and he contacts the delivery company to come to take the merchandises and to deliver them to the customers
The delivery company tells the sales manager when the macarons are delivered
Either the completion time from the order received from the client to the delivery time respected so the client must pay the total amount
Or the delay is not respected and the company makes a discount
The process is completed when the company receives the money
Business process description of a dry cleaning and sewing shop
The process begins when a customer enters the shop he can ask for two different services the washing service of the sewing service
Then the employee places the item in the washing process if the client wants it to be washed of if the item needs some sewing it is placed separately in a crate for the tailor
The first service process begins the following day the item goes through the wash machine and the dryer
Then the third step ironing is done the following day
These three operations are done in two days
The employee calls the client that it s done just after the ironing step and he can come pick up his good
But if the client brings his item at the shop on Friday or on Saturday the process is delayed by two days because the shop is closed on Sunday and on Monday
The second service process sewing is done by a tailor
The tailor comes each Thursday to pick up and return goods
The client is informed by a call when the shop received the item from the tailor
He comes bring it
These two services stop when the client comes and pays in the shop
Stephanie is an interior designer
As a freelancer she advertises on social networks
Clients contact her either by phone email or via social networks
In a first step she meets the customer to develop the 3D plan of their desire
For example a virtual bathroom with the decoration elements they want
Once the plan is finalized and validated Stephanie orders the furniture and paint from the suppliers
When she has received all the material she goes to the customer s home to start her work
She applies the 1st layer of paint
After 48 hours of waiting she put the second coat of paint
Once the second coat of paint is dry 48h she starts to assemble the furniture and the layout of the room
Once the work is finished she presents it to the client who validates or not the result
If the client validates Stephanie sends the invoice
If not she starts a new layout in collaboration with the client
Once this second attempt is validated Stephanie send the invoice
There is a process to follow in order to become a federal officer in the Belgian Scout Federation
First of all this function is accessible to people who are at least 21 years old
In order to be able to access this function it is nevertheless necessary to follow trainings
The first training of 4 days can either be done at the age of 18 years when you are a pioneer in a scout unit Pi Days or at the age of 19 years when you are a section leader T1
The process start when you do you first training
Once this first training is finished Pi Days or T1 you start the 2nd training of 3 days T2
After T2 a practical training of 150 hours is planned which corresponds more or less to a 10 days camp
Once the internship is completed we move on to the 3rd stage of training of 4 days the T3
After the T3 a time of unity TU is foreseen this one will last one WE and will lead to the obtaining of the certificate of scout leader
Once the certificate is obtained the trained person can become a come and see within a unit team for 3 months
After the 3 month period an activity interview meeting is scheduled with the team s federal animator
At this meeting you can either confirm that you want to become a federal manager or decline
If you refuse the position you can either take another position within the federation or stop scouting
The process begins with measuring the gas level at a small gas station
Then send the results to a sales department after 24 hours
A sales member accepts the results of the inventory level that he specifies so that he can send the results to the purchase department
Once the order had been accepted by a member of the purchasing department they proceed to the optimization of transportation
The operation also involves the transfer of fuel to the gas station and the delivery is accepted for the gas station

DELHAIZE is a Belgian supermarket chain that offers student jobs every year
The process starts when the student applies on the company s website
The recruitment manager receives the application and reviews it The application is rejected if the candidate s profit does not match the one the company is looking for and the process ends
In case the profit matches the recruiter schedules an interview with the candidate by sending an invitation
Once the interview is over the recruiter judges and decides whether the application is accepted or rejected
If the application is rejected a message is sent to the unfortunate candidate and the process ends
If the application is accepted an offer is sent to the candidate
After receiving the offer the candidate examines it in turn
If the offer is not satisfactory he rejects it and the process ends
In case of satisfaction he is recruited and the process ends
EUROFRUITS is a fruit and vegetable distributor serving mainly restaurants and fruit shops in the greater Namur region
Being perishable supplies it sometimes happens that the products shipped do not meet the customers requirements
The refund process is as follows
The customer sends a request for a refund
The company receives the refund request
After the request is received by a customer service agent a refund file is created if the customer does not have one
Refund requests of less than 100 are automatically credited to the customer s account
Requests for more than 100 euros must be approved by the supervisor
A refund is automatically credited to the client s account
If the process is not completed after 7 days the agent must send an email to the client indicating that the request is being processed
After 30 days the application is automatically approved
If there is a refusal the client is informed by email
If the application is approved the customer is informed by email and the process is completed
Uber Eats is a mobile application which allows to order food from restaurant and fast food
The deliveries are made by independent drivers
The process starts when the customer chooses a restaurant and make an order
For example the customer order sushi from Sushi Shop
The restaurant is notified that a customer made an order on the Uber tablet
The employee of the restaurant prepares the order
The Uber Eats application send a notification to the nearest available drivers
The driver receives the order and choose to accept it or to refuse it
If he refuses it the order is sent to another driver
When the driver accepts the order he goes to the restaurant to pick up the order
When he took the order he clicks on Start the delivery and the customer is notified that his order is on the way
The customer can follow the driver on the Uber Eats application
The drivers can deliver by car by scooters or by bike
When the driver has delivered the order he can evaluate the customer and click on Order delivered and can accept now new orders

When the customer has received his order he can evaluate the driver and if the driver has already confirmed the delivery he has X minutes to confirm that he received his order and the drivers is paid for his delivery
If after X minutes he does not confirm the delivery the order is automatically confirmed and the drivers is paid the process is finished

In the drying area the customer has to wait outside of his car because of social distancing
The employees dry the outside of the car and the interior of the doors

If he has not a fidelity card the employee asks him if he wants one or not
If yes the customer received a fidelity card
The customer takes his car and leave the carwash the process is finished

At the end of the interview the representative decides if the candidate is right for the internship
If the candidate is right the representative offers him the internship

The process starts when the sending school makes a presentation about the Eramsus
If interested the student sends application to the sending school
The student chooses the destinations where he wants to go from a list
The list contains 50 receiving schools
The sending school receives the destinations and make decision for everyone
For example 3 students are going to Paris 2 others are going to Poland etc
Student are notified of their final destination

Student receives acceptance letter and information about the semester
Student send information for scholarship to the sending school
Sending school accept or reject scholarship
The scholarship amount depends on chosen the destination
If accepted the student receives 30 of the scholarship before leaving
Student leaves for one semester to the destination
Student comes back
Student sends information to sending school to prove the Erasmus is well completed
If conditions are met student receives 70 of the scholarship and the process is finished

The student accepts or rejects the interview invitation
After the interview the company analyses the results
If the results are good or bad the company notify the student of their decision
The student receives the notification
If the results are good the process is finished If they are not good the student starts again with a new company

Process starts when a potential student registers

candidat receives a registration notification

After notifying the candidate the stage of confirmation begins with the 3 parallel stages

To start your registration go to Facebook com
