Cheesecake is THE new trendy pastry
To start preheat your oven to 180 C
Next grease the bottom of the pan you will use to bake your cheesecake
Once this is done crumble the biscuits into a bowl and mix with the melted butter
Spread the mixture on the bottom of the dish
Set aside in the fridge
In the meantime beat the cottage cheese with a whisk and add the flour eggs and sugar
You can add lemon peel or vanilla if you like
These will give your cheese cake more flavour
Carefully place the mixture on the crumbled biscuits
Bake for one hour
Finally leave to cool before unmoulding
Thank you for following my recipe
This is the process of offering a gift for a birthday
The process start when I decide if I will buy the gift in one of the online applications or in a store
If I m busy I use the online applications if I m not I buy in a store
If I decide to buy the gift online I take a look in all online sites to find the gift corresponding to my budget and the offers
If i choose what I m going to buy the application check if I have already entered my data if not the application demands my data
Then I enter my credit card data and execute the payment if I have enough money to execute the operation then it will be executed if not the application will cancel my demand
Aftrewards if the operation went well I choose if I sign on the arrival of purchased item or not
Then the application gives me an estimated waiting time to receive the item
Finally when the time of reception of the item arrives the deliverer comes to the address indicated in the application to give me the article
I sign in his phone or in a paper that I received my order
If I decide to buy the gift in a store I go to see several stores
When I choose what i m going to buy
Then I choose if I m going to pay by cash or by credit card
If I pay by cash I give the salesperson the price of the item
If not I pay by credit card I enter the card code and I take the gift
In the end I give my friend the gift

If I pass the interview I start my internship directly if not I will have to see another company

The process begins when someone is declaring a damage for which he wants to be compensated
For that he has several ways to state the incident
The choice will impact the way the clerk will address the issue
The claim management officer will firstly check if the person declaring is an actual client of Ethias
For the application or the website channel this check will be done by the person itself

Obviously the victim must be a client of Ethias in order to be compensated if not the process ends here by informing the victim the steps that he should follow in order to be eligible for the coverage
In some cases when the incident is claimed by phone the clerk starts by asking the victim if he or she needs some support such as a tow truck for instance
Then the victim will share key information with the officer of the claims management department to make the declaration
Whether it is by phone or by mail the information is transcribed into the IT system
If the declaration is done via the form in the application or website of Ethias the information ends up directly in the IT system
After that the case is opened for the client and the process may continue with the case instruction and examination to see if it meets the conditions to compensate the victim

To this end the clerk will assess if there is a matter of liability in the case or not as well as checking if the client contract covers the damage that occurred and assessing the level of damage by means of experts or by his experience
At the same time the case handler decides which type of reservation the case should follow
In the perspective of an actuarial reservation he informs the actuarial department by sending the case to it
In the other perspective the clerk defines the amount to reserve by himself and sends it to the actuarial department to be approved

The case handler sees if the coverage conditions are fulfilled that is to say that for cases of engaged liabilities the client should be considered liable otherwise it s not up to his insurance to compensate
The other condition is that the contract should cover the damage
In the end a notification with the outcome will be sent to the client and if these conditions are well fulfilled Ethias will compensate for the damage
The case is finally settled or unsettled

In order to understand the reservation process better it is necessary to clarify its purpose in the context of an insurance company reservation allows Ethias to deal with future compensation needs by means of statistical computation techniques for example someone broke his leg this year and because of that he might have complications like a need for a surgery years later
Then his insurance will have to compensate him once again
That s why on the insurance side they have to make a reservation in order to be prepared for these cases
As seen in the claims management process the clerk decides which type of reservation is needed based on his evaluation
Actuarial reservation only deals with cases considered as recurrent and with a higher level of generality also they are most of the time short term cases
Otherwise the clerk determines and evaluates by himself the amount to reserve but still sends it to the actuarial department for approbation
So for this process when the claim management officer informs the actuary that the case needs an actuarial reservation the latter collects all the data regarding the case by means of a database
Then he analyzes it in order to fix new hypotheses which will be used for computation
This computation is handled by a mathematical program
Nevertheless to find which model to use the actuary follows precise guidelines and rules
The outcome of this computation will be checked by the actuarial control 4
If changes are needed the actuary will adjust his model and repeat the computation
After the approbation by the actuarial control the assessment of the case is sent to the accounting department in order to be accounted for
It s up to the actuary to communicate the reservation to the accounting department
To initiate this process a product manager from the marketing or sales department requests to price a product
Then the actuary team of the tarification department will gather data and statistics about the type of incidence that the service covers
The Ethias database is filled with information in order to develop a technical model of tarification to take into account the specific risks and give a first price for the premium

But this price does not always comply with the market demand and customer needs this is the reason why the actuary team and the product manager exchange information to compute a model more suitable for the market
This second version of the model will be sent to the actuarial control in order to be reviewed and to check the perspective of profitability with the business plan
When the review is done if changes are needed the actuary team takes care of remodelling it and shows the model to the actuarial control once again until it s validated by it
This validation must be followed by the agreement of all the stakeholders that are linked with this pricing process
Their agreement is necessary before establishing the tariff and sending it to the product manager
The underwriting process begins when a demand for insurance coverage is perceived by the sales department
This demand is sent either by a peer to peer procedure between Ethias and the organisation by a broker as an intermediate of the concerned company or by a tendering procedure on public markets
This distinction doesn t change the process in essence but rather in the outcomes and the channel of communication
Then the demand is transferred into the CRM system of Ethias either by the sales officer or in some cases automatically
Next the sales officer checks if this demand comply with the business guidelines of Ethias in strategic or relationship terms

Generally the case complies and continues its path towards the underwriting department to follow two successive analysis procedures first an acceptance analysis which is made in order to make the decision to keep such demand or to reject it
If the underwriter doesn t accept it then the process ends otherwise he proceeds in a second time to a tarification analysis
These two phases are modelled as subprocesses which consist of multiple tasks that should be done before setting the tariff and the offer
In addition a competence scheme helps to decide whether the offer needs to be agreed by two other third parties BOL and HAC or not depending on the offer
They can eventually ask for adjustment before pursuing the process
Later on if the third parties agreed when needed the underwriter decides the channel through which he will make the offer

Considering the circumstances he has 3 possibilities the offer could either be led directly towards the client through the CRM system be led to an account manager ACMA that will defend the offer in front of the call for tenders or be placed in a share application for the sales department that will handle it from there
The outcome of the offer will be communicated through the same channel used to make the offer

The last tasks for the underwriter are to settle all the paperwork and then depending on the outcome to classify the case or not if the outcome is negative he must do so if it is positive the onus is not on him to do that and the process is over
This process begins when a client requests insurance coverage
He has the choice to fill in the subscription form digitally or to have contact with a clerk in an agency or via phone call
The sales officer of the front office will define what services the customer needs and check if he is already a client in Ethias
If it s not the case the clerk affiliates him by asking for personal information

Then the officer will check the client s incident data in DataSure which is a database to centralise all the declared incidences from any insurance company in order to decide if he is eligible for the services needed
If he is not eligible the rejection is communicated directly after this verification
Either way the clerk makes the first quotation with the information gathered and hands in to the client or sends it via letter or email if the request is made via phone call
The client reviews it fills it with extra information needed to establish any contracts and sends it back via the channel of his choice
If it is physically then the clerk decides if it meets the criteria of acceptance by analysing the risk
The rejection is also communicated to the client after this verification
If accepted the clerk makes changes if needed by taking into account the review of the client and the extra information
Then the contract is printed and given to the client and waited to be signed
If it is digitally the back office takes care of making the verification with the criteria and establishing the contract by taking into account all the data
All this procedure is simplified if the client firstly decides to fill the subscription digitally
For that he needs to be affiliated and this is made possible thanks to the website or the application
The subscription form and client s data are sent directly to the back office to be evaluated and analysed
The officer checks with the criteria of acceptance and decides whether to send a rejection or to establish and send the contract to be signed by the client
The process starts when an employee is sick or absent for whatever reason

The first step of the process has to be done by the employee he has to send his medical certificate to the human resources and at the same time he has to contact them in order to inform them of the duration of its absence
Thanks to this the human resources can start their own process in which they try to replace him by someone
Then after both of these tasks have been completed the next tasks will mainly concern the human resources department
They have to sort out the different types of medical certificates check if they are certificates without pathologies or certificates with pathologies
On the one hand if and only if the certificate is without any pathology the human resources employee has to check it and verify if the certificate is valid
Then he has to verify some little things like the start of the absence the end of it and then he has to send a mail to SPCM to prevent them

Following this at the same time he has to encode this absence in the system in order that all the organization can be aware of the absence of the employee and he has to notify the medical advisor too and then the medical advisor will have to choose whether the veracity of this absence must be checked or not
On the other hand if and only if this certificate contains pathologies the human resources employee has to send it directly to the Service Provincial de contrle mdical and has to fulfill a form
After that the SPCM checks if the certificate is correct and if there is any problem
After that he then gives his accord to the organization to encode this
So the human resources employee can encode this in the database

Afterwards at the same time they have to notify the medical advisor and then the medical advisor chooses to check the veracity of this absence or not and the human resources employee can check the date the absence etc
After that in addition they receive the acknowledgement of receipt and finally they can put the certificate in the HR certificate folder and the process is over
The process starts at the end of the month when it is time to pay the different employees in the company
We should note that almost the entire process is carried out by human resources

Firstly at the same time the human resources employee is doing 4 different tasks which are check for extra hours check leaving request check attendance system in order to know how many hours the employee worked and then check it with the system Unitime
Finally he checks sickness so if an employee was absent and then uses HR Accent in order to verify this
When all these 4 steps are finally done he writes a recap with all the information so he can export them to Securex
Securex checks the feedback and sends it to the human resources
After receiving the feedback from Securex the human resources employee treats the document in order to make a proposal for the salary
After receiving the proposition there is a question within the HR are we agree with this proposition? If no the process restarted at the proposition of wage slip
If the response is yes we can continue the process
Human resources can then send the payment permission to Securex and wait until the reception of Securex agreement
Subsequently several things have to be done at the same time we are going to describe them branch by branch
Firstly in the first branch he receives the dcompte de paye and then prints it in order to send the file to the employee
Afterwards there is a question Is there any contestation? If there is no contestation we can continue and finalize the process with the acceptation of Securex payment
But if there is a contestation we have to ask the CEO what to do with it and then a new process starts
Finally on the other branch things that need to be done first are to ask Securex to prepare the invoice then we are waiting until Securex creates it and sends it
After this there is another question Are we sending this to accounting or not? If the answer is yes we can accept Securex s payment and the process ends
And if no once again we have to ask the CEO what to do
This process starts when an application is sent by a candidate to the HR which do a first sorting and then a second one
After this the first interview take place

Then we are in the first question which is Is this a key position or not? If yes we need to know if we need complementary assessments if yes a specialist office makes a couple of tests and then sends the results to the HR
After this we conclude whether it is okay or not
If it is not we can dismiss the application and inform the applicant of that
We therefore destroy these data
But if it is okay we arrive to the second interview which is important
If it is not necessary to get more assessments we can go directly to the second interview
So at this moment we are at the same point
After the interview there is a selection if the candidate is not selected then we can dismiss the application and inform the applicant of that and destroy its data
But if the candidate is selected then HR sends a notification to the applicant and welcomes him as a new worker
If it is not a key post we are directly in the step of selection
So if the candidate is not selected then we can dismiss the application and inform the applicant of that and destroy its data
But if the candidate is selected then HR sends a notification to the applicant and welcomes him as a new worker
The process starts when the financial department picks up an invoice in order to pay it
It should be noted that the file in question is recuperated in the ISABEL system
Firstly the financial department employee prints the details of payment
After this he shows the file to the financial director
Afterwards he needs to classify the invoices according to whether they are above 150 000 euros or under 150 000 euros
When we are under 150 000 the financial employee just has to inform the HR department
When we are above 150 000 he has to ask the financial director to find out if it is okay
After these steps we follow the same path in both cases and the process stays located in the financial and accounting department
Then the employee verifies the liquidity on the account in order to know if there are no problems with the treasury

After that he can send money to the bank account send an email to CBC bank with the details of payment and finally register the payment in the SAP system before ending with the receiving of the account statement
This process starts when a client asks for an intervention
This request is directly registered in a file
Then it must be checked if the intervention is included in the contract

If it is not the client must be asked whether he agrees with the financial part and then the client must respond to this in order for the organization to get his feedback If he doesn t agree the process stops
But if he agrees the organization can define the costs of the intervention
If yes the organization can define the costs
After this at that moment we are on the same track it should be chosen if we need an internal quote or an external one
We then arrive to 2 different questions The first one is Do we need an accord regarding the quote? If the answer is yes the approbation of the client has to be asked
If his answer is that it is okay he must be informed about the start of the intervention
Then the intervention is finished
But if he refuses the quote the process ends again
If the answer is no the client must be informed about the start of the intervention and also when it will be finished

The process starts when a customer makes a request to open close the P1 S1 port these are ports on the smart meter that allow the customer to connect their application on which they can consult their energy consumption in real time
The call is received by an interlocutor called Connexio working for a defined network distribution manager in our case for ORES obviously
The Connexio will then control whether the customer is addressing the correct DNM using an identification database
If it is the wrong DNM the Connexio informs the customer and the call ends
Once the DNM check has been carried out he will proceed to a process check

If it is a High Voltage process the customer is redirected to another service otherwise if the process is Low Voltage the Connexio identifies the requester thanks to the database of municipalities and social housing then controls the verbal offer
If it is not a verbal offer the request is transferred to the Connection Work process
If it is a verbal offer the process continues and the Connexio controls the file

If the file is existing he informs the client and the process ends otherwise he communicates the price of the service to the customer and reads the GDPR disclaimer in case of an opening then waits for the client s response
If the client accepts a file is created
Otherwise the file is immediately closed and the process ends
After having created the file the Connexio asks if the client is able to receive a remote operation if he is not able he asks whether the preparatory work is the client s responsibility

If he is able is the client s request unique? If the client s request is not unique he asks if the preparatory work is the client s responsibility otherwise he asks directly what type of appointment to make
Concerning the preparatory work if they are not the client s responsibility then the Connexio asks what type of appointment to make

But if they are the responsibility of the customer the Connexio informs the customer about the preparatory work he waits for a response if the customer does not accept the file is closed and the process ends
If he accepts then he also asks what type of appointment to make

There are two types of appointments The first one is if remote operations work from June 2020 the Connexio sends confirmation to the customer but also to the control room that the thing has been taken into account
The control room receives this remote operation request for opening closing port P1 S1 and the process is terminated

The second one is if the technician has to come to the customer s house the Connexio controls the duration of the intervention he schedules an appointment if the intervention cannot be scheduled the Connexio records the non schedulable intervention request and the call ends
After scheduling the appointment he sends the appointment confirmation to the client waits for the appointment confirmation
After receipt he sends the work order to the technician
The technician receives the file and the process ends
The process is separated in 2 lanes fieldworker and Work control OSP
The process starts with the reception of a request to install a smart meter for the activation of prepayment mode
All the processes arrive at the same gateway so I will describe each process up to the point of intersection and then explain what happens after
1 The customer was present and another customer was present
If the customer wants a recovery they process it to a recovery form
If the customer doesn t want a recovery then they see if it is their first visit a 2 Another customer was not present and the customer accepts the installation
b They check the communication network coverage
If the communication network coverage is adequate they check for fraud
If there is a suspected fraud they send the information to the fraud department and they wait for the attention return from the fraud service which sends an end signal to fraud management
c After that whether there is fraud or not if there is not a smart technical impossibility they replace the meter with a smart meter
If there is a smart technical impossibility and an electromechanical technical impossibility they send the information of non execution of the installation for technical impossibility
If there is not an electromechanical technical impossibility they put a budget meter and activate prepayment mode
If the communication network coverage is not adequate and there is a possibility for deporting the antenna they move the antenna to another area covered by the network and follow c
If there is no possibility for deporting the antenna they check the electromechanical technical possibility such as in c
Another customer was not present and the customer does not accept the installation
If the client is electro sensitive then the process goes directly to the checking of the electromechanics technical impossibility in the c
If the client is not electro sensitive and it is their a first visit the process goes directly to the point of intersection
If it is not their a first visit but it is their second visit and the meter installation is possible before shutdown then the process continues to point b
If the meter installation is not possible before shutdown and a meter cut is possible 2 things happen simultaneously
The first is checking if the meter installation is possible if yes it goes to b if not it goes to the point of intersection
The second is to send the cutout start execution request to the meter and then wait for the message of the smart meter cut back
If there is no cancellation request they perform the cut on the meter

d After that an effective cutoff confirmation is filed which sends a message to the customer then they send the effective cutoff information which lead to the intersection point and e in the Work control OSP lane receiving information on the execution of cuts which send an end signal of management of cut returns
f If there is a cancellation request the process goes to the intersection point
If a meter cut is not possible g they check the possibility of a network cut
If a network cut is possible they send the request to start the execution of the network cut then wait for the message to start network cut back
If there is a cancellation request the process arrives at f and if not they execute the cut network then follow d

If a network cut is not possible they send the non cut information which simultaneously lead the process to the intersection point and in h the work control OSP lane receive the information about non execution of cuts which send an end signal of post administration
3 The customer was not present and it is the first visit
If the meter is not accessible the process goes directly to the intersection point
If the meter was accessible they check the communication network coverage
i If the communication network coverage is adequate they check for fraud
If there is a suspected fraud they send the information to the fraud department and wait for the attention return from the fraud service which sends an end signal to fraud management
j After that whether there is fraud or not if there is not a smart technical impossibility the meter is replaced with a smart meter and the process goes to the intersection
If there is a smart technical impossibility and an electromechanical technical impossibility the information is sent of non execution of the installation for technical impossibility
If there is not an electromechanical technical impossibility they put an electromechanics budget meter and activate prepayment mode
If the communication network coverage is not adequate and there is a possibility for deporting the antenna the antenna is moved to another area covered by the network and follow j
If there is no possibility for deporting the antenna they check the electrical technical possibility such as in j
4 The customer was not present and it is not the first visit
If it is their second visit and a meter installation is possible before shutdown they follow i
If it is not their second visit or it is their second visit but the meter installation is not possible before shutdown they check if a network cut is possible
If yes they send a request to start execution of the network cut and wait for a message of network cut back

If there is a cancellation request the process goes to the intersection point and if not they cut the installation file an effective cutoff notice which sends a message to the customer and send confirmation of effective shutdown which leads the process to the intersection point and in the work control OSP lane following e
If the network cut is not possible the information is sent of the non execution of the cut which lead the process to the intersection point and in the work control OSP lane following h
All of these lead to one gateway after that they complete the worksheet
If the client is present they sign the worksheet and if they are not a calling card is left for the customer which sends a message to them
Both of them lead to saving the worksheet and ending the process in the Work control OSP lane with post administration
This process is divided into 5 lanes planned works technical solution officer supervisor manager and CTM coordinator
The process starts at planned works when an appointment s planning is needed
First thing is to know if it is a grid construction work or not
If it is not a grid construction work planned works assess if it is a civil engineering operation
If it is a civil engineering operation they find out if there is an authorization or an information request a
If it is not a civil engineering operation is it an individual planning? b If it is a grid construction work that is needed the file is sent to the technical solution officer
1 Planned works wait for the period defined in the order then check if there is a request for authorization or information
a If it is an information request planned works show the levelling zone and encodings to Powalco and then check KLIM and CICC and the process goes on
If it is an authorization request they check if the authorization has been received
If it has been received the process goes on if it hasn t planned works contact the competent authorities again to receive the authorization then the process goes on
Planned works then figure out if there s a presence of KLIM CICC
If there is the file is sent to the CTM coordinator 2 and planned works wait for the CTM coordinator s feedback
When the feedback is received the process goes on
* If there is not a presence of KLIM CICC planned works find out if it is an individual planning
b If it is an individual planning the process goes on
If it is not an individual planning they form the batches transmit a list to the contractor and inform the client and the process goes on
c * Planned works then contact the client to arrange an appointment they make the client aware of the preparatory work and then plan the appointment with them
They send a confirmation email to the client
If the reply received is negative planned works contact the client again
c If the reply is positive planned works assess if the work is planned on a contractor
If it is planned works prepare the file that will be sent to the contractor and send it to him
Then the process is done and a signal is sent to the process Execute the work
If it is not the file is sent to a technician and planned works assess if it is a civil engineering operation
If it is not a civil engineering operation the process is done and a signal is sent to the process Execute the work
If it is a civil engineering operation planned works send the file to the contractor to carry out civil engineering
The process is then done and a signal is sent to the process Execute the work
1 When the technical solution officer gets the file they get back the file s investment cronos and check the CTM
If there is a CTM file it is sent to the CTM coordinator 2 and the process goes on
If there is not a CTM file the process goes on
The technical solution officer adjusts the file d asks for authorization inform planned works of the theoretical period *
The officer finally transfers the file to the supervisor and his part is over
When the supervisor gets the file he checks if the authorization is received
If it is not received the process goes back to the officer
d If it is received the supervisor executes the construction work foresees the end of the work and informs the manager which gets the info then sends the file to the manager and the process is done
The manager gets the file foresees the end of the work executes the operation work informs planned works of the end of the works * and then the operation work is done
2 The CTM coordinator gets the file contacts the other recipients visits the work site creates a report and sends the feedback to planned works
He then informs the technician and the contractor and the CTM is managed
The two main ORES services involved in the work execution process are the planned works department and the executing agent working in parallel
Three other ORES actors play a lighter role namely the design office supervision and local logistics manager
Executing agent The process starts with the receipt of the file
Then either civil engineering works are required or not

If they are required the agent plans them informs the planned works of the civil engineering opening date 1 then carries out the inventory of fixtures executes the earthworks and finally confirms the execution of the earthworks to the planned works 2
Otherwise nothing happens
After that the executing agent tries to reach the client 15 minutes before his departure and then goes to his home
If the client can be reached and is present he carries out the inventory of fixtures

If the client is not present at first the agent tries to reach him but if he is still unreachable the executing agent then leaves a calling card calls the BOPW encodes the mobile data and finally signs the report
The Process ends in the management of the nonexecuted
After the inventory of fixtures the agent checks whether additional work at the client s request is necessary if not he can directly check the certificate of conformity
If any work is required the agent looks whether he needs BOPW information
If so he will request it and wait for confirmation
In case of refusal he checks the certificate of conformity
In case of confirmation or if BOPW information is not required he informs the customer of the costs asks for his agreement carries out the work and finally checks the certificate of conformity
After checking the certificate of conformity he checks the power and then jointly measures the column and replaces the meter and the parameter

In the event of a problem at the time of replacement or parameter setting the agent informs the local logistics manager 3 if the problem concerns only one meter the operation is repeated otherwise an electromechanical meter is installed then the customer is informed and the agent answers any questions in the same way as if the parameter setting was carried out correctly
After that if the LED confirms the functionality
Then the meter is switched on otherwise it is left switched off

Then he draws up an inspection plan which he sends to the Ores drawing office 4 enters the connection and counting data confirms the materials used draws up the output inventory and has the customer sign the report

If civil works are required the agent plans the closure of the civil works informs the planned works of the closure date 5 plugs up the holes repairs in a definitive manner makes the inventory of fixtures and finally confirms the completion of the repair to the planned works 6
Finally his last task is to encode the internal services in the case of internal services or to encode the internal services in the case of entrepreneurial work
The process ends by sending the file to the post administration
Planned work The process begins with the planning of the worksite

Then if civil engineering works are required the planned works department receives the civil engineering opening date from the executing agent 1 the department then sends the civil engineering dates to the client waits and finally receives confirmation of the earthworks by the executing agent 2
If no civil engineering works are required the planned works department informs the client by sms of the date of the works 48 hours in advance
The department then receives the execution information
If the execution is not carried out the process ends and the prepare for execution process begins
If it has been carried out there is a waiting period

Finally again if civil works are required the planned works department receives the civil works closing date from the executing agent 5 the department then sends the civil works closing dates to the client waits receives the confirmation of the civil works closing from the executing agent 6 and finally updates the data in the POWALCO software
If there is no civil engineering nothing happens
The process is then completed towards post administration
The drawing office The process starts with the reception of the plan from the executing agent 4 and is then completed towards post administration
Monitoring The process starts with the reception of the date of the works then the service ensures the supervision of the building sites and the process is finished with supervised building sites
Local logistics manager The process starts with the reception of the message from the executing agent 3 then he processes the request and the process ends
The process starts at planned works when a technical visit is needed
If a visit without appointment V1 is needed planned works transfer the request to a technician and waits for feedback with the info concerning the V1
While planned work is waiting a technician gets the request carries out the visit and transfers info to planned works before being done with V1
When planned works get the V1 info they can move on and prepare a file for a technical visit V2
If a V1 is not needed planned works directly prepare a file for a technical visit
Planned works then plan V2 with the client
After they send a request to agents to know their availability
When the agents get the request they process it taking into account geographical and technical skills and send back their availabilities to planned works
After receiving the agents availability planned works confirm the appointment with the client and send the file to a technician
They then wait for feedback while the technician gets the request carries out a technical visit and sends their feedback
When the feedback is received planned works handle it and then assess if civil engineering is required
If it is not required the processing is done
Otherwise the feedback is sent to the contractor and the processing is done

The subscription process is facilitated by the digital transformation in usual context the customer and the company are engaged into an endless mail exchange demanding the documents for the subscription
Thanks to Flora a new client only needs to enter some information about his property and his insurance fee is automatically calculated using the dimension and the location of his property

If the new client is not in the defaulters database there is no need for an employee to take part in the process the contract and insurance details will be automatically digitally created and sent to the customer
If the client is indeed in the defaulter s database Flora needs to conduct a short investigation to determine if they accept the client or not before finishing the process following the classical way
By using this process customers are now able to modify their contract online following a move for instance by simply entering details about their new property

Their new price is calculated in the same way as in the subscription process and the rest is also similar contract and insurance details will be automatically created and sent to the customers as well as the new contract start date
Flora allows the customer to make this report via a chatbox within the mobile app in a few steps
Of course after the declaration an external contractor will come to your place to contact the damage but there is no need to extra paperwork that is usually used with the traditional way
The following process is of high interest as switching insurance can be really difficult and require documents and long procedures from both the former and the new insurance company
Noting that this is actually a sub process of the subscription as most new clients are often covered before subscribing to Flora
To complete the process customers are invited to enter different information about their former contract such as the company and their contract number
Then the resignation form is generated and signed online by clients using Itsme Belgian Mobile ID initiative
The rest of the process is handled by Flora which will deal with the former insurer and will send them the resignation form
Once these tasks are completed details about the former contract terms end date and the new contract start date are sent to customers
At last the new contract will automatically start at the end of the former one
By using Flora a procedure that can take several days for clients is now completed in a few minutes
Filling a complaint is one of the most common processes inside an insurance company

This is usually a very tedious process for the client but now thanks to the new channel of communication it is much easier for the clients using the Flora s application in order to fill a complaint this can be done in few minutes
The prospection and commercial process is triggered by the sales engineers who study the requirements of the prospects potential clients
Then the CEO COO elaborate sales strategy and set individual goals
Sales Engineers receive requests for quotation from clients and afterwards they consider whether the project submitted by the customers is feasible for Alpha or not
If not the request is declined and the process is stopped
But if the quotation is feasible sales engineers work together with the help of R D engineers to make a technical and commercial offer and ask for client s agreement
If the customer s answer is not favorable then they try to know on which point they failed to interest the customer and then the process is stopped
But conversely if the customer s response is favorable then back office registers new client and its order in the ERP system

The sales engineers compare the order with the quotation made at the customer price quantity product description delay and after that a contract is written by the CEO in collaboration with the sales engineer with the possibility of having some negotiations with the customers on commercial terms
If the order is compliant with the offer made the back office checks the availability of the product and the production delay announced by the ERP system
Otherwise the continuity of the process goes back to the steps before there are once again negotiations with the customers in order to find a common agreement
When these two tasks are completed the back office confirms and validates the order to the client and they register the complete order in the ERP system
Once this last step is completed the prospection and commercial process ends
The R D process starts when a need is expressed
Sales engineers and R D engineers formalize the request describe the new product and evaluate the feasibility cost strategy coherence in the early stages
Then the CEO COO challenge their analyze and decide if the feasibility is conceivable the project is stopped if it is not the case
Sales engineers and R D engineers check prototype scale feasibility   conduct tests
If the project is technically validated by R D the production engineers go on by checking industrial feasibility and preparing production file
After that step the Quality Manager certificates the product and requests client s approval by sending them the previous documents

If the customer s feedback is good the bill of materials is made and the current process ends otherwise the engineers continue to improve the development plans and the process is repeated in the stages of carrying out tests and analyzing feasibility on a prototype scale
The process starts when the engineers make the BOM Bill of Materials and send the file with the logistical needs defined by a color code
Consequently a need is expressed and registered in the ERP system
The supply chain department looks at the BOM and then decides if it needs comparative quotes
If the purchase amount is estimated to be greater than 10000 comparative quotes are needed
In this case the supply chain department searches suppliers consults three of them and compare their offers
Then it chooses a supplier
If the purchase amount is estimated to be less than 10000 the supply chain department does not need comparative quotes and directly selects a supplier

After selecting a supplier there are two options If this is a new supplier the specific team composed by the COO the head of the supply chain department and the quality manager performs a supplier audit
If the conclusions of this audit are not positive the supply chain department selects another supplier
If the audit is conclusive the supply chain manager registers supplier s information in the ERP system and sends a notification to the supplier selected
If Alpha Innovations has already worked with this supplier the specific team sends a notification to the supplier selected
Afterwards the supply chain department establishes the order and receives the material once the supplier has fulfilled the order
In some case a conformity certificate is required because AISA works with railway companies RATP for example or nuclear sector where high level of traceability is mandatory

If a conformity certificate is required the supply chain department asks a conformity certificate to the supplier and creates its own conformity certificate this document ensures that the products are not counterfeit items before performing the qual
In some cases the supply chain organizes quality control for incoming and finished goods and the warehouse clerk checks it
Alpha Innovations controls most of the time the products quality except when it comes to checking small parts like basic screws etc
If the quality control shows material is defective the supply chain gives the order to the warehouse clerk to return the product to the supplier
If the quality control is good the warehouse clerk stores the product and registers it in the ERP system
Finally the head of supply chain the quality manager and the COO evaluate the supplier s performance ask for corrective actions if the supplier is not performant enough and then the process ends
The process starts when the workshop manager receives the project from the R D department
With the recommendations from the production engineer he evaluates which and how many workers must be assigned to this project linked to the difficulty s level of the latter
With the help of the supply chain manager he checks when all the needed material BOM will be available in stock at the factory
With all this information he gives an approximation of the delivery date to the customer

He receives a set of documents thanks to the ERP system which describes the BOM Bill of Materials mechanical plans electrical scheme control prescription everything that is needed to organize production of the project
The supply chain department receives the document and launches a production order to the warehouse clerk who prepares and sends all the materials needed to the workshop
At this stage the workshop manager must prepare assembly aid documents which describe the production process adapted to the type of work to be executed
The function of the workshop manager is also to describe the jobs of each technician involved
Afterwards technicians operate first they prepare nameplates to be able to identify all the products and cables
Secondly they assembly the systems while they identify themselves at each step of the process for the tracing and consequently the responsibility
The workshop manager is responsible for describing the complexity of conformity control which is afterwards operate by the technicians
At this stage test technicians operate the FAI First Article Inspection they inspect the finished systems to see if it is safe functional and conform to the specifications
If all tests are conclusive the system is sent to the shipment employee who will package and send it to customers with the help of other actors haulers
The systems production process ends at the moment the system is submitted to the shipment employee
The process is triggered when the product is received by the packaging employee who packages the product
Then two tasks are done in parallel addition of a suitable ID label to the package and wedging and wrapping to protect the product
The packaging employee makes the delivery form and send it to the head of shipment department who is going to give a pick list number and afterwards registers the pick list number on the ERP system
Later on the packaging employee fills the picklist with the product s information weight date on the ERP system
Subsequently the employee stores the product in the shipment area
After that the head of shipment management received on the ERP system the picklist completed and then classify the picklist by due date until the delivery day
When the delivery day has come the back office does two tasks at the same time to prepare the delivery note and print it and prepare the invoice and print it as well
After that the back office sends the documents to all services concerned via the ERP system i e accounting
Finally the packaging employee add the waybill and the delivery note on the package and thereafter he gives the package to the haulers
The process ends when the order is sent
The process starts when IT equipment is needed by a service manager
The request is first analyzed by the head of the IT Department and they have to decide if the request is justified or not
If the request is not justified the process ends
If the request is justified they also have to decide if they accept it or not in some cases the request is justified but the solution requested to this need seems to be inappropriate

If the request is not accepted but stays justified obviously the service manager has the opportunity to adapt the request and suggests a new request that the head of IT Department will analyze again and the process starts again
The service manager has also the choice to not adapt his request and the process ends in this case
But if the request is accepted then the head of IT department asks for a quote
If it is the first time that the supplier works with the company the purchasing department has to add this supplier in the suppliers evaluation form
If the budget or treasury will be affected with this expense the Chief Financial Officer has to analyze the expense and decides if he validates the expense or not
If he does not validate it then the head of the IT Department has to ask for a new quote to a new supplier
If the expense is validated the head of the IT Department completes the purchase form and then the purchasing department makes the order and sends it to the supplier

When the order is ready the supplier sends it with the purchase documents that is to say the invoice and the acknowledgement of receipt to the head of the IT department who sends after all to the service manager
Next both the head of the IT department and the purchasing department compare the purchase order with the delivery and the invoice
If one of them finds something incorrect they contact the supplier in order to solve the problem and then compare it again and contact the supplier again until everything is in order
When everything is correct or if everything was right the first time the Chief Financial Officer has to validate the purchase
If he does not validate it the comparison process between the invoice the purchase order and the delivery starts again until the amount to be spent aligns with their expectations
If he validates the purchase then he pays the invoice and the process ends
The process starts when the need is notified by the receipt of a purchase order form by the service manager
Then the purchase department has to analyse the demand if it is not ok the demand is obviously rejected and the process ends
Otherwise they have to request a quote
If the quote is asked to a new supplier the purchasing department has to add it into the evaluation suppliers form data base

Then the financial management has to validate the quote if it is not ok the demand has to be analysed again but if it is financially ok the service can be ordered so the service department asks for an intervention
The supplier performs the requested service and sends the purchase documents purchase order and invoice afterwards

Next the purchasing department compares the purchase order with the invoice received and has to validate if something is wrong the invoice is not validated and the department contacts the supplier for another validation
Otherwise the financial department has to validate it a second time
Again if it is not ok the purchase department has to compare it again but if it is ok the financial department puts the invoice in payment and the process ends when the service provider is paid
The process starts with the presentation of the candidate at the office
He enrolls for the examination
The centre manager checks the planning in the license database if the candidate is already planned
If it is not the case the centre has to create a new file for this candidate in the license database
Then he registers the candidate to the examination
The applicant has to pay for his registration
If the payment is not received the candidate is rejected and the process ends
Otherwise the process continues and the centre manager checks the validity of the candidate and guide s ID cards
If those are invalid the candidate is rejected and the process ends
If on the contrary the ID cards are acceptable the centre manager checks the age conditions
If those are not fulfilled the candidate is rejected and the process ends
Otherwise the process continues and the centre checks that the ID card corresponds to the candidate
If he notices a mismatch the Chief examiner seizes his ID card and warns the authorities
The candidate is rejected and the process ends
If it corresponds the centre checks the temporary driving license and the certificate from the municipality
If those are invalid the candidate is rejected and the process ends
If those are valid there are 2 possibilities
Either the applicant has learned by a driving school or by another guide
This second case requires an additional step the centre checks the guide driving license
If his driving license is invalid the process ends and the candidate is rejected
If it is valid the process keeps going
This step is not necessary if the candidate has learnt by a driving school
Next the centre checks the vehicle documents
If those are not valid the candidate is rejected and the process ends
Otherwise the process continues with the examiner who checks the vehicle state
If he evaluates the car as defective the candidate is rejected and the process ends

On the contrary if the vehicle is in good conditions the centre manager makes a random selection of the examination track thanks to the IT system of the company and the candidate is allowed to take the examination
The candidate is accepted and the process ends
The process starts when the candidate arrives at the centre
An employee of the centre completes the identity verification form at least every 25 candidates and checks the validity of the client s ID card according to the regulation
If the ID card is not valid the process ends and the client is refused
If it is valid the client s age is checked once again according to the legislation
If the candidate doesn t fulfil the age requirement the process ends and he is refused
In the case where the client fulfils the age requirement the centre employee checks that the card corresponds to the candidate
If the card is not corresponding to the candidate the employee takes the ID card warns the authorities and the process ends
The client is thus refused because of failure and fraud
If the card corresponds to the candidate the centre employee checks the number of failures and the driving school certificate if necessary
The employee then registers the candidate
If a session is not available the client asks the availability and or takes an appointment then comes back to the beginning arrival
If a session is available he checks that the client is already in the database
If the client isn t the centre employee creates a new file in the Database Permis DB Permis
If the client was already registered or has just been registered the employee registers the candidates and checks his data
After that the client has paid the employee generates a session for the candidate according to his category from the DB Permis which generates a random series of questions
The client takes the exam
If a fraud is detected during the exam the centre interrupts the exam and warns the authorities the client is then refused failure and fraud and the process ends
In each case the results are printed by the centre
If the exam is passed the client takes the reading test and the process ends with the delivery of the provisional driving licence PCP the results and some information
If the exam is failed the client is given the results of the exam
The process starts when the candidate arrives at the examination centre
There is a previous control of the vehicle by the examinator before he makes a random selection for the track with the IT system
Then he takes note of the track and manoeuvres
The customer makes the track and manoeuvres directed by the examinator according to the traffic regulations
The examinator assesses the abilities of the candidate
If he makes a dangerous manoeuvre the exam is interrupted
Otherwise the examinator makes a global assessment of the exam and he registers the assessments with the IT system
He encodes the results and sends them to the server of the company with the IT system and the protocol of the exam
Then he archives the protocol and at the same time he gives the result to the candidate
If the result is a success the exam is passed but if it is a failure the exam is failed
The first step in the registration process is the quote calculation
It begins when someone needs to obtain a tenant insurance
The user will then take an interest in Flora and go to the website
The customer will go on dcouvrir mon prix and so the quote calculation process begins
The user is now on the page where he selects the type of housing
It can be a house 2 or 3 faces a villa 4 faces or a flat
Selecting an accommodation type enables the user to move forward to the next screen
The user just has to click on the right button to go further there is no continue button
Then the user has to enter his address to go further in the process
When the user starts typing his address a drop down list appears with all the street names corresponding to the entered characters
In order to move forward the user has to select one address in the Google results and the system moves on directly to the next page
If the user enters an address abroad the pop up window appears informing the user that Flora is only available in Belgium

If the user lives in a zone subject to flooding a pop up window also appears to say that the house is located in a zone subject to flooding and that the user cannot be insured for the moment the user can be redirected to the Ethias website
If the address is unknow the message Je ne trouve pas mon adresse appears
The user is redirected to the page where he has to enter manually his address he has to complete manually all the fields
If the address is known located in Belgium and complete the user clicks on Confirmer and is then redirected to the monthly rental amount page
The monthly rental amount is a mandatory field
If it is left empty a warning red notice must ask the user to correctly fill it out Max of characters 7
If the user enters a higher rent the pop up window appears informing the user that Flora doesn t insure properties with a rent higher than 1500
The user can decide to move on to the Ethias website or exit the Flora s quote calculation process by clicking on the X in the upper right hand corner the button Je comprends
The user then goes to the Prix page which mentions the price of the rental insurance for his property at his address
The price covers the civil liability and the content of the housing
The user can choose to add or not add the vandalism cover
To finish this process the user has to tick the Checkbox of the terms conditions before being able to continue
Once the quote calculation process is complete a customer profile must be created
This process starts with the screen mon compte the user must fill in different information First name name date of birth phone number email address and password are mandatory fields
Before going to the next step the system makes a verification about the age of the user
In fact the user must be between eighteen and hundred years old because they consider that outside this age slice you are less likely to take out insurance
So if the customer is under eighteen or over hundred the process stops and the customer gets stuck

The next step consists in checking if the email address still exists in the system because it is possible to have a user who has given the account creation just after entering the personal information or who has left the process for a moment perhaps to pick up where he left off later on
So if the email address did not still exist Flora will then send an email to the user in order to allow him to validate his email address
In the email the user can push on a button Valider mon compte or on another Je n ai pas demand de compte Flora
If the email address still existed we can go on the next step
After that Flora has to check if the email address is still validated
If it is the case the account is created and it s the final event
If the user did not confirm his email address and pushed on button Je n ai pas demand de compte Flora the process stops and no account will be created for the user
Just in order to precise a little at the end of this business process the user is still not a customer he is a prospect
He will become a customer once he will be logged into the application as such
This step of the process is important because it will be impossible for the user to use the app as long as he is not a real client
Indeed he will be considered as a prospective customer until the moment he makes the payment
Without this payment even if the user created an account he is not allowed to gain access to the application
The first stage consists in asking the client information about his moving in the housing
On the one hand if he already moved in Flora will invite the client to state if he is insured for this housing or not
In case of a client who is already insured Flora will ask the user to enter the contact details of his previous insurer and we will deal with the termination of his contract
On the other hand if the user has not moved in yet the app will request him to enter the date of moving in and his future address
After that he will be invited to choose a payment method
The client will soon be allowed to choose among three different means of payment with a credit card via PayPal or via Apple Pay
For the moment there are only two payment methods available the credit card and PayPal
By selecting the credit card as mean of payment the user will be redirected to the next screen
At that point he will have to encode his card number the name of the card the validity date and the CVV number
Obviously there will be no direct debit before the start of the contract
In the case where the user would want to pay with PayPal he would be redirected to the PayPal interface in order to check that the available balance on PayPal is sufficient to pay

Then the user can click on the button Suivant which will redirect him to another screen with a summary of his contract type of housing monthly rental amount full address contract duration price credit card registered and so on
After having checked the elements of his contract he must accept the general terms conditions before subscribing to the product and paying
Then he can click on Confirmer and in that case it means that the user wants to confirm and pay
Once the contract is confirmed the client will be invited to download the application in order to handle his insurance directly from the application
From the moment he confirmed the contract is forward to him by email
Finally at this step of the process the client receives a confirmation email with the documents related to the contract attached
If he receives this email it means that the payment is accepted and therefore the contract is confirmed
From a legal point of view it is mandatory to send a confirmation email to the policyholder
From that moment the client can log in into his account access his profile and his documents ask questions manage decisions and request a refund in the event of a damage
First of all when the client wants to create a new claim he needs to open the chat bot in the app
The date of the damage will be requested from the customer to verify if he was covered by insurance at the time of the damage
If this is not the case the client will not be compensated
Then the client will receive a reduced list of the frequent damage and will be asked to select the damage concerned
If the damage is not in this list then it may be part of the list of damages not covered and in this case the customer will not be compensated
Or the client may request to be put in contact with the CCM customer communication management
However if the damage has been found on the list the process continues normally
The client will then be asked whether or not it was a personal property
If it is then the client will give more information about the asset
And if it is not the process continues to the next step

In that step the client will have the opportunity to report another claim if this is the case the client will be sent back to the beginning of the process in order to give all the necessary information again
If there is no further damage to report then the customer will be asked for the owner s contact information
Afterwards the application will ask the customer if there is at least one property that belongs to the owner
In both cases a summary adapted to the situation will be sent to the customer
Finally if the customer wishes to conclude and send the notification of the damages he will have to click on Envoyer the damage will be transferred and the case will be finished
Once the damage has been notified and that the claim has been transferred to Ma demande it will be transferred to the customer manager
He will then process the claim starting by judging whether or not it is important
If the claim is significant he will call in an expert to determine the amount of compensation
Otherwise he will define the amount himself on the basis of the information provided by the customer in the Flora application
It is possible that the customer manager may not have the necessary information to calculate the refund
In this case he will send an e mail to the customer to request the missing information
Once the amount of compensation has been determined the customer manager will enter it into the application
Then if this amount is higher than 1000 euro the Flora application must approve the compensation request before sending it to the customer
If Flora detects a flaw it will inform the customer manager who will re analyse the situation
Otherwise if Flora approves the request for compensation or in the event that the amount is less than 100 euro the compensation proposal will be sent to the customer
The next step depends on the client s approval of the compensation proposal
If the customer approves Flora will ask for the customer s bank account number and an electronic signature via ITSME
Once the compensation proposal has been signed the client will be reimbursed and will receive a notification that the file has been closed
The client receives the compensation amount on his bank account and the process is thus completed
If on the other hand the customer does not approve the compensation proposal Flora will forward this refusal to the customer manager
The acquisition of lands and buildings process by Spi follows a certain chain of events decisions and actions
First of all they start by asking the government procurement if there is any land or buildings available
In order to do this they send a letter expressing their wish

If there are no lands or buildings available they express to the government procurement that they are aiming to buy so they fill in a form to be added to the waiting list and they will be notified when an opportunity comes along
If something is available the procedure usually begins with an estimation of the property solicited by the government procurement
Then this estimation is reported to Spi
Since Spi is aiming to rent or sell these acquisitions before they buy lands and buildings they need to be sure that they will bring interests to their clients
So they decide to carry out a market research and see if the assets are interesting enough
If it is not interesting they decide to drop off
If it is interesting then Spi asks their experts to carry out their own estimation of the asset
If the estimation matches they carry out the next step otherwise the company and the government procurement try to reach an agreement
Without any agreement found the company can decide to end the acquisition process
After they agree on a price Spi asks the bank if they are allowed to have a loan
To do so the financial department provides the bank with the expertise and the result of the market research
Then they have to wait 10 days to have a decision from the banker

If after 10 days they don t have an answer they can reschedule an appointment to have the final decision usually if they don t have an answer after 10 days it s because the loan has been rejected so during this second meeting they will try to find a new arrangement
If no arrangement has been found the process ends here
The commercialization of plots of lands and building starts when Spi receives by email the interest of a client to buy a building or a plot of land
Then it has to acknowledge confirm the receipt in order to follow the sale
Once the receipt acknowledges Spi has a free two month reservation to send a form to the candidate buyer
This one fills out the request and sends it back to the company which has the duty to complete sign and date the form
Once this first step done Spi executive board has one month to take a decision about the sale of its plots of land or building
The agreement between these two parts remain valid for a period of six months

Then the company gives an agreement in principle to formalize the contract and the sales otherwise if the candidate buyer doesn t respect this six month validity Spi cancels the contract and the client is obliged to give 10 of the sum of the land or the building to the company e g when the client doesn t want to buy the land anymore before the 6 months
When the six months are respected Spi will receive the 10 of the value of the land by the candidate buyer and it has to sign the deed
Later Spi checks if the payment is correct and if the reservation fee has been paid in one month
Then if all is done in the rules Spi orders the measuring plan and the placement of markers on the sold property
The reception of the proof credit from a bank by Spi leads to the selling of the land
Otherwise if the reservation fee is not received in one month the order is rejected
The Head of the rental department receives a request concerning the rental of a building
He sends the request to the legal department they check whether the request is complete and legal
If the document is not complete the client gets a message saying that he has to complete his documents
If the document is complete the head of the rental department schedules a meeting with the client
During this meeting the client proposes a price
If the price is too low the head of the department does a counterproposal which is then accepted or not by the client
When the client refuses the negotiations are over and we consider the process done
When a correct deal has been reached by the 2 parties we draft a contract
When the contract is signed the process has reached its end

The appeal for intervention process in which the trigger event is the need for services such as reparations gardening Once the problem is identified the maintenance department looks for companies with qualified people who could fill this need and then get in touch with that company
They explain the need or issue
If this person is indeed qualified for this request a quote is asked
When the quote from the company is received the maintenance department examines it
If it seems correct they send it to the financial department which determines if it fits the company s budget in order to submit their agreement or not
If they do agree the maintenance department contacts the company again to complete the final terms and sign a contract
Otherwise they explain to the company that they do not want to go any further and restart the search for qualified people
Once both parties have signed the contract the financial department proceeds with the payment
Finally the maintenance department checks the service delivery to be sure that it is well done and that it meets their expectations
The data analysis process is done in several steps First data analysts collect data from different sources for every sector
Then they merge the data from different sources and make a relation between them unnecessary data is cleaned in order to concentrate on the economic analysis
Data analysts analyze the evolution of the annual revenue of the companies for each sector and they combine the data of SPI with the one coming from the outside sources
Finally the results are interpreted and the analysts make the best economic analysis possible and come to a conclusion
The report of the analysis is then published in the database of the company so that it is accessible to everyone
Everything starts when a student is positive for the COVID 19
The school will receive the information via email phone or even via SMS

Whether it s via phone the school management will ask some specific questions such as what was the last day in class when did the student do the test when did the student receive the results and so on
Then they will fulfil the file with their own information such as the place where the student is sitting in class the schedule from each class To do so they must dispose of the class plans
Moreover it should be done regarding one clear and precise model
Once the file is completed they can start analysing the information
The first and the most important one is to know who the students with high risks are

For that they will consult the class plans and will make groups of students those who are behind the positive student are not impacted nevertheless those who are on both sides from this student are risky only if they have had close contact with the positive student without masks
Unfortunately this operation is hard because of option courses
Indeed there are a lot of different class plans for these courses meaning that students are not always sitting next to the same students depending on the courses
Once every single information has been collected they will send the complete file to the Safety Advisor via email

When she receives the email she will make a first analysis then she will either transfer the file to the PSE the School Medicine or just will share the information that there is one more positive student in the school in order to receive a solution to implement
However if it is an urgent situation the school management will take the decision to close a class without consulting the PSE
In the normal process the PSE will analyse the sent file and will send instructions to the Safety Advisor who will send them to the school management
On the one hand students with high risks will receive a mail with the procedure to apply and a coming back date
On the other hand students with no risks will receive a small mail to be aware of the positive student
If it is possible one or two members of the school management will go to the concerned class to give some extra information about the s positive student and answer some questions
If the class is closed the school management will send another email to specify it
Then they will phone each parent
After that each excluded student will receive work on the LMS platform and thereby a coming back date
The process begins when a teacher is absent

If the teacher is absent for more than 3 months at least 15 weeks then they have to hire a priority temporary that is a teacher who has already given lessons either in the school or in a group of schools attached to the school for at least 360 days accumulated not necessarily in the same school
In this case the management looks in its database for a priority temporary
If there is a priority temporary in the database they contact him her by phone
Finally a management member sends the schedule of the teacher to be replaced to the substitute teacher and the teacher is replaced
If the teacher is absent for less than a day then he is not replaced
However if he she is absent for more than a day then a substitute teacher must be found

To find a substitute teacher there are two possible ways either the candidate has sent his her CV printed and classified in a folder in order of importance of the title or via the website Primoweb on which we will be able to go do a search according to the teacher you want to hire
Management will be able to enter a series of criteria such as the duration of the exercise the branch of expertise and so on
Then after pushing on the search button they can see the number of titles required of sufficient titles and of shortage titles
In the case of application by CV the candidate selection sub process begins when the file containing the applications is opened If there are required titles available then these are directly selected
Otherwise we go to sufficient titles
If there is no sufficient title we move on to shortage titles
If there is no shortage title we move on to unlisted shortage titles
In the case of a candidate who has none of these titles it would be considered an error in the system and the process would end
Then the CV is downloaded by all members of the management
In the case of Primoweb we will first choose the required titles then the sufficient titles and then the shortage titles the unlisted shortage titles are not listed on Primoweb
Then we send an email to the candidate
If he she accepts his CV is downloaded by all members of the management
If he she refuses then the management goes back to Primoweb and looks for another replacement again in order of degree of importance
If he she does not respond within 3 days the management returns to Primoweb and searches for another replacement always in order of degree of importance
This process can sometimes take a very long time
After downloading the candidate s CV the members of the management will judge whether it is interesting or not
If it s not interesting that ends the process and the candidate is rejected
If the CV is interesting we are faced with 2 situations
If the situation is urgent for example when a teacher falls ill then the substitute teacher is directly contacted by telephone to replace the absent teacher
If the situation is not urgent or at least foreseeable for example in the case of a work stoppage related to pregnancy then they will send an email to the candidate to prepare an interview
The management team will then do the interview
If the interview is successful a member of the management phones the candidate to confirm the replacement of the teacher
If the interview is not good the candidate is rejected
After calling the candidate they usually send the schedule of the teacher to be replaced
The process starts when the teacher wants to do an excursion with his students
Once the teacher has found an excursion he she has to download an excursion document located on the digital workspace of the school in order to complete the first point of the document
